summary: Dave and Busters Fun App
recentChanges: Enhancements and bug fixes.
comments: The old version of the app was better. The new version does not let you redeem emailed coupons (from surveys etc) in the app. Seems like fewer coupons and offers pop up in the app than they used to. It also takes a long time (a couple business days?) to load rewards points from the power card onto the app. Also fewer options of specific $ amounts to reload the power card in-app, than in-store. Better than nothing but could be better!

The app is already pretty bad as it is, but they need to change the image they use for the tiny Notification bar. I was literally getting frustrated this morning because I couldn't find what I thought was a Shell Gas notification so I could clear the icon, but it turned out to be a spam notification from this app. That's another thing D&B, there's a difference between a notification and an ad. My notification bar is not your billboard!

Glitchy as hell! It takes forever to load your card on the app...even when connected to WiFi. I lhad to uninstall and install the app several times, upload Google Pay and a credit card and finally after hours of messing with it, I got to reload my card. I have no issues with processing payments on any other app except this one. I doubt my info is even secure. Looks and acts like someone with no experience developed it.

I mainly downloaded this app bc of the 30% off your first purchase, however after going through and paying and getting my points, I couldn't use my phone as the digital game card. I've used my phone's nfc for many of purchases in the past so I knew it worked. Kinda disappointed bc I got my friends to download it and it worked for them. Had to go wait in line to get my points transferred onto a card. Kinda defeated the purpose of "skipping the line"

Really appreciate the first time 50% off coupon but afterwards there is never any offers. Literally never any new offers afterwards. Old version was better. I didn't go to Dave and buster's for 6 months because full price recharge is not enough gameplay. Unless I spend 50 or 100 which is too expensive. Can you put a buy 20 get 20 free please? At least 1 last time?

comments: This is a very tough and good obstacle game, but it‚Äôs just super boring. I don‚Äôt know what is bothering me but I get bored all the time. Especially when they are just bots playing. I want to play in multiplayer when you are online. Or, there will be options whether you wanna be multiplayer, or single player. Other than that, this is a great game! ^^

This game is sooo amazing.Just started playing and now I can't stop playing.And I don't care about the adds.As long as I üòç this game.So if there was a trillion stars,I will rate a xillion stars.Keep up the great work on FunRace 3D.üòçüòçüòçüíùüíùüíùüé†üé†üé†üé†üè©üè©üéâüéâüéâ

I loved this game. Well, all until i had to reset my phone. When i had my account and everything on my phone i downloaded this again and it started me over but i wasnt to worried because i knew i can account back any time i wanted. But then, it started lagging, and glitching, and doinh things it wanted too. So when i tried to get my account back, everytime i clicked it, it did nothing. I dont recommend.

At first the game was really fun and I really liked it and it was great how you could customize your person, but then one time I tried playing it and I opened up the app it restarted and I couldn't start from the level I was at. I tried going intosettings and pressing the restart button but it just didn't work. üò£‚òπÔ∏èüòñ

It doesn't move when you make it move, it's slow and wastes time thus making one lose a game and it will be like that for like two to three games before one could win a particular game to move to the next round and it's unfair that the computer competitors always win by cheating, then what's the fun of the game if one has difficulties moving in the game and also having cheating opponent?. I hope that the game company takes this matter seriously and do something about it.

title: Fun Run 3 - Multiplayer Games
description:
Join our community of 100 million Fun Run players from all around the world in one of the best online multiplayer games - Fun Run 3 Arena! Get ready for running games with even more action-packed craziness than before ‚Äì enter to win big against your furry opponents!

Fun Run is Back
We are back with the third chapter in the Fun Run saga ‚Äì FUN RUN 3: ARENA ‚Äì with more of the mischief and mayhem that you loved in Fun Run and Fun Run 2. Challenge 8 of your online friends or random
people and run faster than them in this thrilling online multiplayer game mode. Be the fastest runner as
you crush your rivals in one of the coolest racing games you have ever played before!

Ridiculously Funny Running Game
Fun Run 3 takes the legendary gameplay of classic running race games and adds a new dimension of cool! Race against other real players while escaping almost real obstacles in a really funny game. Sabotage your rival runners‚Äô progress to WIN the race in this fun game to play online. No holding back! Slash, crush, and destroy your opponents to the finish line!

Arena Gameplay
Arena is the where eight furries fight against elimination in an addicting game mode! Only the fastest 3 reach the finish line for amazing rewards and ultimate glory. Today is the race day, on which you become the victorious and fulfill your destiny to be among the winners who reach the ARENA CHAMPION podium.

Form a Clan & Run with Friends
Run with your clan buddies! Participate in multiplayer games online with friends or total strangers. Find friends online to show them how it‚Äôs done! Fun Run 3 is all about playing awesome games with friends ‚Äì and beating them to the finish line!

Show off your style and be the coolest critter in the forest!
We packed this Fun Run game with hilarious fashionable accessories! Choose from different furry friends and dress them up with cool hats, boots, sunglasses and even more swag to show off your funny games style!

Cool & Fun Features
‚òÖ Clan Battles in a 2v2 mode! 
‚òÖ 30+ new power-ups!
‚òÖ Arena - the new 8 player racing game mode!
‚òÖ Race against friends or random players in real-time!
‚òÖ Slam & Slide: two new actions to leave the opposition in the dust!
‚òÖ Customize your avatar with more options than ever!
‚òÖ Conquer lots of new levels!
‚òÖ Climb the leaderboards and challenge the best players in the world!

Fun Run 3: Arena is a free online multiplayer game ‚Äì an internet connection is required.
The Arena awaits! Download Fun Run 3 now and start running! Ready, Set, GO!

summary: Race, play & beat your friends or other people in the funniest running game!
recentChanges: UI improvements for reporting players. These will be released in stages over the next weeks.
comments: The game is good but there's a few problems with it. 1st of all you can kill yourself with your own traps which is dumb. Secondly, the arena will eliminate u as soon as it senses that u are losing badly. And finally, some of the maps are way too crazy. Besides those flaws the game is pretty good.

I was just casually scrolling through the app store for a game when I came across this app. I used to play it all the time back in 2017, so i considered downloading it to see if it improved..So I did, opened the app, and I was sent to a race right away. The controls were hard, it had blood and guts in it. It's a pretty fun and enjoyable game. I dont reccomend it to kids under the age of 8 though..

So far I'm on bronze l, and I already love the game! I've only played for 1 single day. I like how making a clan isn't super expensive, like in other games. This is also a way to do something when you're bored. Although, the quick plays, I cant get over how I think they're bots. There only lvl 4 and on silver already. It surprises me. But, still love the awsome game.

The Game Is great but to support you I think you should change or look into this. When I click watch ad, it just says loading and I wait 15 seconds just staring at the loading screen. The ad button works 50/50 most of the time but I'm just wondering if that is supposed to happen. Thanks for making a game my friends and I can play :)

Good game but PLEAAAAASE make all maps available for normal races! You only race on the same few maps over and over yet there are so many more that can only be used during custom races. Like swimming maps etc. Let us race on those in normal races too. Gets so boring and repetitive running on the same maps all the time. Edit: those maps are now available during all races so thanks so much for that!! Changed my rating to 5. Highly addictive game

Guess the word and have fun. Challenging word puzzles will light up your day. Play word games with friends in single or multiplayer. Pictoword is funny for girls, boys, adults and the whole family!

title: Warp My Face: Fun Photo Editor
description:
Sometimes life can be boring. But now you will be able to break those boring moments by making everybody laugh. The amusing, exciting and extreme entertaining Warp My Face ‚Äì Fun Photo Editor app is here.
 
Bring a smile into your friends‚Äô everyday life thanks to this hilarious face morpher.

If you like face warp apps, photo editor apps, fun photo effects, face changer apps, swap faces apps or funny photos in general you will love Warp My Face: Fun Photo Editor! Enjoy hours of fun and laughter with Warp My Face: Fun Photo Editor! If you like Warp My Face: Fun Photo Editor then please rate it with 5 stars. Thank you!
 
Take a photo of your gallery or one you downloaded and distort, bend, stretch or melt a face as you like.
Make the subjects of your pictures fatter or skinnier by enlarging or narrowing their faces.
Transform your friends in some sort of crazy monsters by displacing and deforming completely some part of their faces.
Take some pictures of your colleagues at work / school, at your sport club, from your class mates, etc. and create some comic caricatures of them to share a big smile with them.
How will they look like? Will they appear fatter, thinner, whimsical, like an alien, funny, or maybe slightly scary? Find it out, with this amazing tool!
 
With this fantastic tool you will be able to create fake pictures to send per mail, share with Whatsapp, Twitter, Skype, another Messenger Tool or simply upload them to Facebook, Flickr, Dropbox etc.
 
Features:

- Warp tool (Select the warp tool, tap somewhere on the face of your image and drag to move around pixels.)

- Rotate your pics clockwise and counterclockwise
- Responsive and quick manipulation
- You can warp every image whether it has been made from your camera or if it has been downloaded from internet.
- Add some animated cartoon special effects (heart eyes and breath, bright stars, etc.)
- Save and share your amusing pictures with the world

- There are two beautiful test models available to get used to the morphing tools

Take a picture of your boy / girlfriend and deform his / her face like it would be made of rubber and check if they have a good sense of humor. ;-)
 
With this free face changer app it is very easy to fake your photos. Enjoy Warp My Face: Fun Photo Editor now!

title: Lie Detector Simulator Fun
description:
The Lie Detector Simulator is a game created to have some innocent fun and simulates a fingerprint scanner for detecting lies. You can prank and make fun of your friends, kids or others by getting them to think you can detect if they are lying to you.

Preset answers (truth or lie) in the settings menu and then ask them questions. Have them place their finger on the fingerprint scanner while answering the questions. The app will display the preset answers.

If you choose to play for fun, just cancel all the settings and the app will respond randomly, alternating between truth and lie.

Disclaimer: This app is just a prank, a fun game and it is not a real lie detector (polygraph) nor a real fingerprint scanner.

Compete with others with your favorite unicorn and get real enjoyment of horse running in this racing games. Jump over the hurdles in this running games and increase your ranking in the racing world. Go and enjoy horse games in this fun race to become a professional runner. A fantastic horse game where you will explore your skill on multiple maps with the selective unicorn to compete the others. Compatible racing game for all age users which will attract the players with its astonishing gameplay and features in this unicorn games. 
HOW TO PLAY?

title: Plexiword: Fun Word Guessing Games, Brain Thinking
description:
From the creators of Pictoword and Word Beach comes Plexiword - an addicting new series of fun word & picture guessing games where you guess words and phrases from clever pictograms. It‚Äôs free puzzle games for teens and adults alike to enhance brain training & spelling skills with fun word-based brain teasers!

Also known as Word Tricky on iOS! Play this game in a car or on the beach, amazing!

For example, you'll see the letters T O U C H written vertically. Read the word from top to bottom to solve for TOUCHDOWN! Mind teasers with Plexiword may leave you perplexed, but each challenging brain exercise will feel rewarding once you solve the puzzle. When a word puzzle game has you stumped, try brainstorming by looking at color, the position of the word, saying the word out loud or asking a friend!  

With offline mode, enjoy brain training and spelling games everywhere you go, with thinking games for boys, girls and adults of any age. Free puzzle games can be played with friends online, or you can have fun offline! Guess the word, earn coins & train your brain wherever you are.

Plexiword Features:

Classic Word Games for Girls, Boys and Adults alike
‚Ä¢ Word puzzles from Plexiword are simple yet challenging. Fun for adults and teens alike!
‚Ä¢ Word games that feature challenging brain teasers to help players test their wordplay skills. 
‚Ä¢ Word guessing games include a variety of elements for each puzzle, including color, word positions, pictogram images and more!
‚Ä¢ Over 300 word game puzzles and brain teasers to test your creative thinking and spelling skills.

Fun Offline Games with Brain Training Skills
‚Ä¢ Fun offline games include tools to help you out in a pinch, like deleting letters and skipping questions entirely, if you get too stuck.
‚Ä¢ Play brain games online to ask your friends from Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Tumblr for additional help.
‚Ä¢ Play offline without wifi ‚Äì Plexiword is great for long car rides and not using up your data!

Family Games with Simple Trivia Gameplay
‚Ä¢ Trivia fans will love Plexiword‚Äôs fun twists. Challenge your mind and see how you do!
‚Ä¢ Plexiworld is perfect for the whole family, with word puzzles of all difficulties.
‚Ä¢ Play games for boys and girls of all ages, or take on brain training games for adults. There‚Äôs a word puzzle for everyone!
‚Ä¢ Family game night with Plexiword is fun for the whole family! Boys, girls and adults can try guessing games together to solve fun word puzzles.

Mind teasers like you‚Äôve never seen
‚Ä¢ The concept of Plexiword is simple - just letter games with a twist. Easy to pick up but challenging to master!
‚Ä¢ Brain workouts are fun with Plexiword‚Äôs unique gameplay.
‚Ä¢ Spelling games for adults take an all new direction with Plexiword. Train your brain and have fun at the same time!

If you love Pictoword - you will love Plexiword too!

Whether you‚Äôre looking to train your brain, challenge your mind or just for some fun trivia word games, Plexiword is the game for you.  For those who like challenging games and creative brain teasers, you won't be able to stop playing Plexiword, one of the most addicting word guessing games for family and friends!

Privacy Policy - https://kooapps.com/#faqsTab-privacy2. 
Email us support@kooapps.com for any questions.

Parents please purchase the no ads upgrade for kids to play with you. Kids are only allowed to play with parental supervision.

title: Yes Or No - Funny Ask and Answer Questions game
description:
Yes Or No is a funny game and addicting game that gives awesome, unusual way to spend your free time (or when bored) and also to laugh or learn something curious! It's a simple yes or no game, where you answer questions by clicking Yes or No button. Fun games (and funny games as well) like Yes Or No are really rare. Install and check it out! You don't lose anything - game is absolutely free :)

‚òÖ‚òÖ Features ‚òÖ‚òÖ
‚úî Hundreds of Yes or No questions
‚úî Frequently updated with more content 
‚úî Submit your own yes or No questions
‚úî Completely free to play
‚úî View real time statistics on what option (yes or No) was more popular
‚úî Family friendly questions making it the perfect app for all ages.
‚úî Compete with other players to be on the TOP of the ranking
‚úî One of the most funny games in your life

Answer questions such as:
- Have you ever had a dream that came true?
- Do you know, that most of the people don't shave their armpits?
- Do you know, that most of the people have low self-esteem?
- Do you like making people laugh?
- Have you ever used a dating app before?
- Have you ever play the game Truth or Dare before?
- Do you like fun games?
- Are you enjoying funny games?

Stats shows you how many people also answered on this question and how. Game is very funny and many of our users think that this game is in top 10 in their very fun games list! It's not end. The most awesome thing is that you can add your own Yes or No questions into the game! Then you can see how other people (including kids) answer on your questions, so you will be able to share it with your friends :) 

You can play in this game when you are bored, when you are in school, with your crush or friends or even family. It's really really fun game (one of the most fun games in fact)! Also it's an awesome girl game - we see that a lot of our users are girls! Thank you - really, you all are awesome!
Another fun thing is that you can try to predict which option will be greater.

You can find very good questions in our game, because every question is moderate by our people. Keep it in mind when you will add your own Yes or No question. This fun game gives you a lot of questions. Good graphics and interface are not the only advantages! Check out this really fun Yes or No game now :)

- Choose your preferences and see how many people will do the same as you!
- Are you sure, that you will do things that you are asking in app? Or maybe you chickened out? 
- If you will answer on all questions, you can always add your own Yes or No question to see what other people will answer!
- You are totally anonymous in answered questions like an asked questions! Only percentages matters. So you don't need to worry about anything.

What option would you rather pick? Play in one of our most fun games now to find out! 
Feedback is always appreciated.
Have fun! :)

Question games are great to improve your imagination and read skill. One of such a question games is Yes Or No - fun games when your bored! You can as well send question answer it, and - laugh from jokes! Perfect game when you're bored :).

1. INTERNET CONNECTION IS NEEDED TO PLAY THIS GAME!
2. You are totally ANONYMOUS in this game, so you don't need to worry that someone will track you or will find out what did you answer. We do not store such information on our server. We only stores a sum of answers not a specific answers itself. Please keep it in mind.
3. If you don't want to answer on some Yes or No questions you don't need to. If you think that some of questions are too personal or hurts you just click skip button in top right corner.

Please keep this points in mind installing and rating this game, because we tried to do everything to satisfy you and to make this game good, fun and educational for you

comments: The game is interesting. I got all the way to epic... The only problem is I played more ads than I did the game to get there from the very beginning of my download, and because of that I will delete this app before ever giving it a real chance. You want people to pay for no ads? Reduce the current ad rate and people might pay for it more often instead of hitting the uninstall button.

The bots sucks not gonna lie. The problem is that there is no music and sound effects and the bots will NOT move until i moved and they want me to get 1st place which is boring!! And the levels sometimes repeat. And it's not even challenging and easy to play. I'll give 2 star for a good obstacles.

At the beginning of the game(first two levels) I was doing just fine then as the game went on and on They started CHEATING in the LEVEL with the BALL PINS swirling around and stuff..just to be clear I DOWNLOADED this game TODAY and DELETED this game TODAY..lol literally WASTED my SPACE

This game was fun until i had to reinstall it. Now the control lags and only race against 1 person instead of 2. Also will not respond when trying to watch videos. Wish there was an option to create account so when you either get a new phone or have to reset it you wont lose your progess
Entertaining but again. An ad after every round. It even gives you the option, ad for gold? No thanks. Ok well, here's an ad. Want a prize? Watch an ad. No thanks ok well no prize, here's an ad.

+ Battle against others in the Squad Wars
+ Performance improvements
+ Minor bug fixes
comments: The game itself is fine. My issue is with the ridiculous amount of ads, almost all of which run for 30 seconds and then generste a second ad that runs for an additional 15 seconds before you can close it. An ad will play after almost any action you take and sometimes they will just play without you actually doing anything. Worst of all is that the game also keeps asking me to take some NRA survey. All of this ruins an otherwise decent game.

I like this game so far. Tier11. 1.There is an ad after almost every mission/pvp/worldops round. 2. During world ops I kill a group, but their is another person shooting at me from somewhere I can't see, thus I can't kill them and then I don't get my world ops tokens worth for that round bc they kill me first. Same thing during pvp, I can't see someone, but they can see me and I die first. Please fix it. 3. Always trying to get you to buy stuff. "Special offers" cost more than what you got.

Fun game.Not to many guns you have to work your way up to. I only play the free version. It would be a 5 star game if you didn't let people use cheats. It seriously sucks the fun right outta the game. I've worked my way up, watching ADS for free Diamonds, completed every primary and spec ops mission, even get offered higher tier guns for completing mission so quick, but it wont let me buy because I haven't got to that city yet. Please stop the free coin for users that dont appreciate a real game

The game is fun and graphics are great but every time you do anything at all they try to get you to purchase stuff. I even signed up for premium and still have to purchase things to continue playing. Oh, and they put your diamonds you win during missions in a "piggy bank" so you can't use them until they say you can, unless you pay real money to open the "piggy bank" early. And you need the diamonds for upgrades and weapons. Also, after all the waiting, you have to pay 2.99 to open piggybank

I've made purchases of $170.00 in gems this month, was playing WOPS, and when I came out of the round, my Gem count was reduced by a total of 36,000 gems, the equivalent of over $100.00. That was four days ago and I've yet to hear back from support. Is this a "good game"? You do the math... It's been over three weeks and still no word back from support.

title: Pixel.Fun
description:
The beautiful town lost its color, how to bring it back to life? Move your fingers, color by the right numbers and the whole town will be lighted up! 

There are lots of lovely houses, cars, flowers, animals, boys and girls on the street. Find them and color for them! All scenes and characters will fit together nicely and make for a wonderful town! 

We have different styles of street for you to color. Want to know what they will look like when finishing coloring?
Download Pixel.Fun now and start your fantasy and colorful journey anytime!

---Nice Features---
Color by number
Tons of free pixel art
Different styles of street for you to color
Sync date on all devices
Click scene to color and light up the street
Paint quickly with free magic props  
Find special scenes or characters to get advanced props   
Get rewards by finishing and sharing your pixel art 
Save your pixel art as short time-lapse video
Share with friends on Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp etc.
Color stress away

More features and new streets are coming soon :D

developerAddress: 19H Maxgrand Plaza, No.3 Tai Yau Street, San Po Kong, Kowloon Hong Kong
recentChanges: Optimize function, fix bugs
comments: I love it so so so much. The controls are really easy, the flow of the game is great, the pictures are awesome. I love how you can choose the pictures in whatever order you want, it's nice because sometimes I don't have time or energy to complete one of the most complicated pictures, so I just go and choose a more simple one and can still play without getting stuck in the harder ones.

I have absolutely adored the app since I downloaded it days ago. The only improvements I would suggest are featuring an option to pay for the removal of ads and then to fix moving an image. Using two fingers, you can move the picture, but zooming occurs at the same time. This could be fixed by installing a feature that could sort of bounce between moving and coloring. So one finger could be used to scroll the image. If these could be fixed, I'll happily re-vote to 5 stars.

I love this scroll down the street as you color it. I chose easy mode to get used to it. Trying to figure out how to invite friends. Just starting so my rating may change. So far so good and fun. UPDATE - I have finished all the streets of the game and I can't wait until new ones come out. 5 stars still as of February 2020. Ty for so much fun.

When I first downloaded this game it was pretty relaxing and enjoyable. Now with the new update I'm getting so many ads I'm more than likely deleting this app. What a shame. Edit: yeah I get, a lot of free games give the option of ads, I mean, every time I try to go to a new painting I have to watch one? The frequency is what kills me. Not just the fact that it's an ad.

This game is fun but.... The game freezes. When I finish a picture and go to color more, the screen freezes. I have to exit the app then reenter for me to color more. I have to do this all the time. Please fix this.

title: Block Craft 3D: Building Simulator Games For Free
description:
Do you like building games?
Block Craft 3D is a new free city building game. 

Download now one of the best simulation games of 2017!
Start building and show the world your constructions. Block Craft is a free game.

Features:
‚Ä¢  Fun building game: Lots of different constructions. Build a house, a castle, a mine or even a spaceship and the Eiffel Tower!
‚Ä¢  One of the best simulation games: it's a fun and free simulator game! 
‚Ä¢  Lots of pixels: enjoy the special pixel graphics.
‚Ä¢  Free game: play for free!
‚Ä¢  Choose your character
‚Ä¢  New: adopt and play with animals! It's fun!

Highlights: 
Amazing buildings in 3D
Ready? Block? Go! Learn the game by building your house, a fortress or a mine... Decorate your building with your furniture with your own skins! Play now one of the best construction games!

Lots of Pets and free exploration
Play with pets! Adopt a dog, a cat or even an elephant! Unlike other block games, there are no monsters in Block Craft 3D: you can focus on constructing the best buildings or exploring the world.

Multiplayer game: visit your friends
Start the exploration! You can visit the city built by your friends (or foes) and help them finish their construction. Multiplayer is so much fun!

Create and sell
In Block Craft, no need for mods, launcher or PE. You can create the custom blocks, craft special furniture or complete blueprint of building! And even better: sell those and receive lots of gems!

Not so creative?
In Block Craft 3D, no need for maps, just visit the village of your friends to get new ideas and follow the blueprints and guides to easily build fantastic constructions.

Review by tech website Techtudo:
"... Block Craft is a beautiful and fun game. (...) fans will spend hours exploring and having fun in a complete, free game for mobile phones".

Block Craft is one of the best building games! Try this simulator now and have fun building your city!

Block Craft 3D: Free Building is brought to you by Fun Games for Free, creator of the 100+ Million downloads games Flight Pilot Simulator, Sniper 3D and Sniper Shooter.

comments: Here's how you really got to play this game. In the tutorial don't start your village. You can wonder around in the village they show you at the intro. Great way to understand that building is limitless. So after falling down their well. You can start your village. But don't buy anything yet. The game allows you to build with unlimited blocks, until you buy your first building. Wait till you get your building experience down then buy. And you can get 500 gems for free. Happy Building

I like the app .I am really writing this to complain about the villagers,they are SUPER ANNOYING I can't build anything without them getting in the way! I built a big house but its empty, all because I cant put things in it without them teleporting in to my house!!!! Most of my village they can go to but there are like 2 building that are private wich are my house and my pool. They already have there own pool! So I went FAR but there still teleporting there. Take there teleporting ability away!

I really love this game! It's just like Minecraft but a little different. But I have some things I wish would be in the game... First of all, can there be like a daily reward? I wish that would happen.. I'm really broke. Secondly, I would recommend gaining XP while your in the game, you can only get XP when you are building something from the workshop, and you need gems to buy them. How are you going to get gems if your broke? Well, there is the Free Gems thing but it only gives you 2 gems.

This game is really fun!!! You get to build whatever you want... on level three you only have 150 of every block and the animals and stuff you have to buy them with your gems. If you want to build something big and you run out of blocks you ethier have to watch a video of use your gems.

The experience is great. You don't only build your own city but you can build what you please! Most tell you to make your own world how you would like but, How do you do that without showing you how to play? This doesn't only do that but Even after it they put up a guide to build. I Just press the house until I'm done. You can do that to because if you have a different block then what you put down it Puts down the correct one on your build. This was a great alternative to Minecraft. Thx!!! üíìüíì

title: Crowd City
description:
Become the biggest crowd in town!
Gather people accross the city and crush your opponents with your overwhelming leadership!
descriptionHTML:
Become the biggest crowd in town!
Gather people accross the city and crush your opponents with your overwhelming leadership!
summary: The real crowd experience!
recentChanges: Minor bugfix
comments: It's my favorite app/game of all time and I would give it 5 stars if a) it was truly multi-player (instead of bots) and b) the ongoing lag issues that make navigation awkward and sometimes impossible (if you accumulate a large number of members, which is the point) was fixed for good. Paying to go ad-free is worth it, but the speed issues ruin it.

The game is fun for about ten attempts and then it gets extremely repetitive. There's only one level to play and the rounds are only two minutes long. The short time period makes it impossible to recover if you get attacked once, and there were several times I ran around trying to attack people but just couldn't find them in the time given. Aside from the gameplay you have to watch an ad after every single two minute round. It's fun to play for a few minutes but tries too hard to be slitherio

I like this game because it is really satisfying to play. But sometimes when I open the app, the whole game just hangs. On the other hand, ads aren't a problem for me. I just turn off my internet, and I can play with no problem, making it ad-free. Other than the problems in the game, it's still really good!

I love it but Not being able to SCORE HIGHER points Sucks! Please add a (LEADERSHIP Board), ways to earn more points with coins or giants or something to get higher scores. I also wish I could HEAR and change sounds, adjust several time options ( 5, 10, 15) minutes spent on the board, opt out of ADS, FEEL vibrations, change speeds by double tapping or something, go into tunnels, up ramps, e.t.c.

The only issue with the game is the timing what i think..... One can play the game until he is not dead or all other players are not dead this timing concept is very irritating..... When we start enjoying the game the timer comes in between which is frustrating.... Hope the developer will consider it

title: Diggy's Adventure: Fun Logic Puzzles & Maze Escape
description:
Join Diggy, the Professor, Linda and Rusty on their journey! Explore the world full of mines, learn from an ancient civilization and solve unforgettable puzzles. Escape each maze and reveal the greatest mysteries of the past in Diggy‚Äôs Adventure online game!

No secret may remain hidden in this 2D maze! Find your path in a terra incognita labyrinth while you discover new characters of this story or maybe an ancient civilization. Will you be able to escape the puzzle mine?

Do you like cognitive games that put you to the limit? Try this mining treasure hunt and prove you intelligence! Other brain games are merely crosswords while with this one you will be able to explore a hidden labyrinth filled with lots of riddles until you find the right path! A true miner does not forget his hunt for gold so hit those rocks and explore rich rooms while you enjoy the mining.

Diggy's Adventure Features:
‚ñ∂ Are you a fan of jigsaws? There are 1000+ riddles to solve from different civilizations.
‚ñ∂ 500+ labyrinths to escape from with different difficulty levels. Do not get trapped in a deep dungeon!
‚ñ∂ 500+ funny characters to interact with. Tap on your miner avatar and check your loot!
‚ñ∂ 4 mythological locations with loads of forgotten treasures. Smash your way through this mine maze!
‚ñ∂ Stuck with a puzzle? Our online customer support responds within 24 hours.
‚ñ∂ New free content every week: from a puzzle to a temple, don't forget to check this maze game updates!
‚ñ∂ Dig and search for hidden treasures, fulfill godly quests and riddles.
‚ñ∂ Act like an actual archeologist, find secrets of ancient worlds.
‚ñ∂ Use your clues to open chests and explore as a miner!
‚ñ∂ Dig like a miner and find new loot or even a treasure!

By digging through the 2D puzzle mines you will acquire various items that can be used for solving jigsaws, replenishing energy when you are offline or crafting new items in the camp. You can also embellish your camps with beautiful decorations, items and other content. Craft new items or cook ingredients to help you dig in a dungeon or a maze and become the greatest adventure hunt lover in this world. This is not a classic treasure hunt, hit all the tiles and get enough gold to resume the adventure hunt!

Solve 2D riddles and escape the puzzle maze so you can gain rewards and experience points that improve the rate of energy regeneration or maximum energy capacity. Keep digging through the mines and fulfilling in-game quests assigned by Gods, follow the right path so you can find a new room and forget about other adventure games! You can also enjoy special labyrinth events, dungeons and offers, set camps into vivid themes or send gifts to other player. Solve the mystery and the puzzle! Learn from a new civilization while you escape from an endless maze and dig in the mine! Enjoy this 2D mining adventure full of jigsaws!

PLEASE NOTE! Diggy's Adventure is an online free game to download and play that requires a network connection to play. Some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. if you don't want to use this feature please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Do you have any suggestions or problems in the mine? Our caring community managers would love to hear from you, visit https://care.pxfd.co/diggysadventure!

Terms of Use: http://pxfd.co/eula
Privacy Policy: http://pxfd.co/privacy

Do you enjoy our idle puzzle game? Follow @DiggysAdventure on social media to get the latest news and updates.

comments: Fun game, could be better. Very good graphics 7/10, Magnificent gameplay and storylines 11/10. To improve the game I recommend adding more campground stuff, maybe a sliding map to add the stuff that the flash version had. I also recommend adding more levels to the underground storage, and putting more of the 2018 & 2017 campaigns up for purchase. I really want to finish the superhero campaigns. Also, a half-off week for underground clearing would be most appreciated.

This is one of the best STILL FREE Mine Crawler games out there. Let's be real. It doesn't give you some of the instant gratification that most current games do. This Game is LITERALLY the definition of start small and BUILD. The very fact the Devs are coming out fresh NEW content, and it's ALL FREE is something to be applauded. Start playing, get about 5-10 levels in and you wanna see what happens next. üíñ this game.

No idea how I found this game but what a blast it is. I just get confused how it sends you all over but when you look at the map it shows a certain area wasn't completed before it sends you to another area. But it is fun and so far the algorithm of the game is fair when it comes to energy etc. Created account but not sure it linked. You'd think it'd give us a prize or something. How do I know my stuff will be saved? Created an account through a Facebook link on your page?

A fun time killer. I enjoy the mini strategy games strewn throughout the levels. I find it's a great mind numbing game to use for bed time and even enjoy it enough to play during my awake hours. They do a good job of offering assistance through their website if you get stuck on a puzzle because you def have to infer what's needed on more than a few puzzles. I kind of enjoy the fact that it makes you work harder to figure it out. Def a fun download.

I like it. I haven't paid for anything and am not feeling frustrated w waiting for my energy returns. There are plenty of opportunities to earn improvements to increase the pace of production and capacity of energy storage, as well as making foods to restore energy immediately. There are lots of fun, resource rich events. It's a good game.

comments: It's a really fun and it will make the time go by faster if your bored. I downloaded it a week ago and I have been playin ever since everyday for like 1 hour atleadt. Especially at school when I have free time it's a good time waster to make it seem like you haven't waited at all. Download it and try it for yourself and u will see what I'm talkin about . I had a 500 word limit and dont know what else to sayüò≠üò≠üòÇthat's why it sounds

It is pretty good but there is the get coins if u watch an ad and you get 180 coins then when you get a certin amount of coins you get a free bike. I used to be able to watch them continously and then once i stopped watching them they would disappear for a day then i would get them back now i can only use them twice and they disappear for a day plz fiz this!

It's a decent game for the gameplay side. But the tournaments are completely broken. You cant get a 3+ star bike. You just cant. To evolve a bike to be 3 stars you need to get the old school bike. The problem is, the old school bike doesnt exist. You cant get it through 2 star bike races, and the chances of a special game for it is 0.0000001%, not joking, that only occurs once a month. The best part is, you only get 1 out of 4 parts per win. You can of course cheat the game by paying. Of course.

I played this a long time ago and really enjoyed it. Downloaded it again and suddenly got a "$5 gift card" to use. One of the bikes were on sale at just below $5 so I guessed I would get it for free, but no, they charged me instead. The amount isn't the problem, but it's a disgusting way to make money by blatantly lying, not cool.

Ashamed. I used to play this when very young and this was amazing. Now when i just played this i came back to see every bike "Vip" which you have to pay monthly for when you could just earn by completing tasks back in the day. This game became money hungry and not fun anymore

title: Flow Free
description:
Flow Free¬Æ is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.

Connect matching colors with pipe to create a Flow¬Æ. Pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle in Flow Free. But watch out, pipes will break if they cross or overlap!

Free play through hundreds of levels, or race against the clock in Time Trial mode. Flow Free gameplay ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic, and everywhere in between. How you play is up to you. So, give Flow Free a try, and experience "mind like water"!

Flow Free features:

‚òÖ Over 2,500 free puzzles
‚òÖ Free Play and Time Trial modes
‚òÖ Clean, colorful graphics
‚òÖ Fun sound effects

Special thanks to Noodlecake Studios, creators of Super Stickman Golf, for their work on Flow Free!

Enjoy.

comments: Honestly, it's a good game that I have always enjoyed in the past. My thing is that I don't recall there ever being this many ads before. I'm not faulting this game for trying to make money with ad revenue but I am faulting how they've implemented it. I noticed that there is now an option to watch an ad and get a hint. My problem lays in that I will get unskippable 30 sec ads after I complete a puzzle with out touching the option for watching a video to get a hint. It takes away from the game.

At first when my daughter introduced me to Free Flow, I must admit, I was reluctant. However, after watching how much she was enjoying the game, I became curious. Needless to say, at this point, it has become my favorite game. I am 71yrs old and I've been playing for quite some time now. By the way, I had accumulated over 440 hints which disappeared overnight. What happened?

A really good puzzle game that I have spent many hrs playing, so good that I paid for the extra levels and I don't normally pay for anything extra, I have played the other Flow Free games and enjoyed them too and I like the challenge as the levels get harder and would recommend this to anyone who's searching for a really good puzzle game üëç

Game is wonderful... My only concern with it is that most of these levels are WAYYY too easy... Even the "beginner" levels should be slightly more challenging.... Or you should give the player the option to replay the levels but on a harder difficulty, just a idea for the future... But as someone who loves puzzels like these ones i would like it to be more challenging

Did rate it 5* but recently they've added a ridiculous number of long unskippable ads - they're every 3 games or so, which is usually less than a minute! title: Kiss Kiss: Spin the Bottle for Chatting & Fun
description:
Tired of the traditional kissing games? Kiss Kiss: spin the bottle is your new chance to fall in love and find amazing friends. Join one of the best bottle spin games!

Kiss or Dare? Don‚Äôt be shy! Meet people around the world in seconds: more than 25,000,000 players worldwide have already joined our exciting bottle game. Kiss Kiss is one of the best dating games for chatting, dating, and having fun with players in your city and other countries. 

Complete fun, simple tasks to find a multitude of new friends. Chat and swap compliments, participate in friendly matches, bombard your competitors with snowballs, get more kisses than anyone else and win in contests. 

Kiss Kiss is:
‚ù§ A fun game to play spin the bottle (or truth or dare) with friends from Facebook, as well as more than 25 million players from all over the world 
‚ù§ Talk openly in age-specific chat rooms about anything, keep in mind - this is the game for adults

How is Kiss Kiss played?

Spin the bottle! During a game, the Bottle will point to a random user of the opposite sex with whom you then have a chance to kiss. Whether you kiss them or not is up to you. Send free virtual gifts and compliments to users you like, or choose to bombard those you don‚Äôt like with snowballs and eggs. By completing simple and fun tasks you will easily get to know people you find attractive. Also, by gathering one of many gift collections you will receive a beautiful photo frame that'll help you get even more likes.

Kiss Kiss is an amazing friendship app as well as a dating app that gives you a chance to meet THE ONE. You never know who you meet today, maybe it‚Äôs a future best buddy or your first love. 

There are many love games for girls and boys but only in Kiss Kiss you can become a part of the worldwide community of people, learn about new cultures and, of course, virtually kiss a girl or a guy you like. 

Kiss Kiss is the best dating game available free of charge for everyone. Spin the bottle today to change your life tomorrow! üòâ

comments: I have just started using this app. I love that you can create your own designs (mandalas,flowers)and there is a very wide selection of colors. I am using a trial of the paid app ($5.99/week) or ($24.00/month) so I don't know whether the free version has annoying ads. I will have to report back in a month or so to see if it is worth $24.00 . Note: I have limited drawing skills, and have mostly done coloring books or coloring apps. So far, this is good for a beginning artist.

Good game, but this coloring app is like drawing book, when giving color we must use our imagination, approximately what color is suitable for the image that we want to color. That's not easy, so this game is made for those who want to be creative with colors that match the picture. The overall of this game is great, with more editing to make picture look beautiful. This very-very different from others, but it's not suitable for me :)

I would give it more stars if almost everything you would have to pay for and it makes it just boring I think they need to add more to the free stuff and not the paying stuff because one day all the free ones are going to be all done and have to make your own but your bad at drawing if it didn't have so much stuff you had to pay for I would give it five stars :(

I tried to cancel payment for the app but can't find a way. Uninstalling only takes it off phone, it doesn't cancel the charges either. I liked the app well enough but only wanted to try the free week, yet won't let me opt out. Charging my card either way unless I cancel my card so they can't take payments. What a hassle! DEFINITELY NOT worth all the effort just to use the free week trial. When you sign up,says you can cancel anytime before payment, but there's no way to do it when you try :(

The reason for the 2‚òÜs is simply because there's not enough free options. I'm thinking hard about uninstalling this app, which is a shame because I'd love to be able to color most of what's made in here to color. However..... $10 a week is too much right now for me and outsode of that, I don't see how it's worth that right now with the extreme limited free options. More than likely, I'll be uninstalling after I color all the free options....

title: Just 2 Pics
description:
Just 2 Pics is a simple yet addictive free word game where you "read" 2 pics that combine to create a word or phrase!
Over 350 fun word puzzles. Sharpen your skills, Anywhere, Anytime!

Just 2 Pics is a fun free trivia word game. Fun game for word nerds. 2 Pics are all you need!

‚òÖPURE AND INSTANT FUN‚òÖ
No registration, no complicated rules. Just start playing, guess the word from the picture, and have fun!

‚òÖSIMPLE AND HIGHLY ADDICTIVE FUN GAMEPLAY‚òÖ
2 Pics 1 Word. Which word are we looking for? Look at the 2 pics; find out what word represents the picture. Guess the word. Win!

‚òÖOFFLINE FUN TRIVIA WORD GAME‚òÖ
You can play Just 2 Pics word game offline anywhere anytime. No Internet is required!

‚òÖFAMILY FRIENDLY‚òÖ

title: Pets Race - Fun Multiplayer PvP Online Racing Game
description:
Run, jump and race against friends in Pets Race, the amazing multiplayer runner where you race as tiny pets! Put your PVP platformer skills to the test as you battle in online multiplayer for first place and collect special loot to keep your pets happy!

Pick up items and boosts to slow down the competition as you dash platform to platform, leaving your competition in the dust. Don‚Äôt forget to collect coins to customize your cats and dogs and upgrade their pet world. You can even treat your pets with yummy foods! 

Download now if you love the idea of mixing racing games with cute cat and cute dog games! Aim for the finish line with friends in one of the most fun running games on the Play Store, Pets Race! 

Ready? Set? Pets Race!

= Pets Race Features =

PVP Racing - Multiplayer Racing Games with Friends
‚Ä¢ Endless Runner: The more you run, the higher you rank
‚Ä¢ Animal racing Games: Race as cats and dogs against friends!

‚Ä¢ Platformer Games: Race across fun courses like Barksburg, Puppy Pier or Mt. Meowmeow

Happy Pets

‚Ä¢ Pet World: Collect coins to buy the animals treats and new pet beds for their world!
‚Ä¢ Pet Run: Play as cats and dogs. Have fun racing with friends!
‚Ä¢ Cat Run: Show off your Platform skills as a cute cat
‚Ä¢ Dog Run: Race as a puppy and separate yourself from the pack

Battle in online multiplayer runner games and gather special items to stay ahead of the competition! You‚Äôve never played a multiplayer platformer so cute, or combative! >:3

If you love fun running games and kart games, get ready to battle in this online multiplayer animal race and aim for first place in Pets Race!

comments: The games are entertaining and fun but there is no way to earn gems. I would change this by 1 let us use the stars that we earn to buy gems or 2 when we complete a level/pack we earn a certain number of gems. I also think you should add a word game where you just give us one word and then we have to find a certain number of other words in it and the harder the level the more words we have to find.

I've been playing the game for some time now and while I was not at first impressed, it has grown on me - I still think that the money given or earned is not enough to make the game as interesting or smooth as it could be, but it's a great game nonetheless!

UPDATE: After playing a while the ads start coming more frequently, those horrible horrible ads that you hit the X and it takes you straight to play store to download the stupid game they're advertising instead of back to the game... Do this about 5 times for each ad BECAUSE IT WONT LET YOU GET BACK TO GAME for SEVERAL MINUTES. I'm so sick of those kind of ads... UNINSTALLING

Game runs smoothly. Easy concept of how to play the game. It is a bit challenging even on the 1st couple of levels. Which i think should have started out a little easier, but It is fun to play and builds your brain üíÅGreat Job guys!

I loved it ! I wish I could keep playing games like these . It's amazing how much fun your having that when it ends your left with wishing for more! Thanks for a great game of words . Keep up the great work and I hope you create more word games I can play !

comments: Graphics of almost a comic book feel is really nice. However I find it hard to see how this is an escape game? Every level is just one little puzzle in one layout facing the door, theres no panning around a room as such. No collecting items and combine them with puzzles and yet most of these are just riddles? I'm sorry and just my opinion, its boring. However the ads aren't that bad. Every few levels, yes there is an ad but you can click away as fast it popped up so there you have it I guess.
Puzzles are decent - they just have nothing to do with opening doors, except the ones where you enter the answer on a keypad. So not a bad "escape" game but not an outstanding one either.
The clues and graphics were good .However i only got to level 23. I was sick of all the ads. I have never played an escape game were you run out of energy? I am uninstalling.
Really liked the game but when I went to upload the video for enery I was stuck on another game to load and didn't get my lightening. Don't want to wait ten minutes to play a ten second game
Very well put together, simple game. I would say don't get this game expecting it to be a challenge. It's more of a kids game. But a very good kids game.

title: JusTalk - Free Video Calls and Fun Video Chat
description:
JusTalk is a FREE high-quality video, voice and group calling app for everyone - simple, reliable, secure and fun, so you never miss a moment.

WHY USE JUSTALK:

Free Calls
Make free HD-quality voice or video calls over Wi-Fi or on-the-go (2.5G/3G/4G/5G)*.

Make Calls a Lot More Fun
Doodle, recording lively voice or video calls, play games, send stickers, share photos, and more all in one voice or video call!

Say More Than Texts
Send and receive pictures, voices, videos, location, stickers, GIFs, and more 1:1 or in groups.

Group Voice Call And Video Chat (meetings)
Create as many groups as you like to make group voice calls or group video chats with family, friends or coworkers up to 16 people. Enjoy high quality audio and super high definition video calls. Easily control the group call (mute, block new participants or remove attendees, enlarge anyone‚Äôs screen). Simultaneously send group text, images, and videos.

Out Call
Make international calls with Out Call at low calling rates. Using cheap cost Out Call to reach your friends anytime even when they‚Äôre offline.

Live Video
Start a live video chat to share your moments with your loved ones during voice call. 

Cross-platform
Video chat all your friends across any types of smartphones & tablets with just one simple app.

And Much More
Create your own unique JusTalk ID and make your friends easy to search for your account. Add new friends by shared name cards or QR code. Bluetooth auto connect supported. Choose themes (light & dark modes) and express yourself musically with ringtones.

Private and Secure
All information and calls are end-to-end encrypted so that information and call data are split into multiple random path. It ensures that calls can‚Äôt be monitored or saved by servers.

*Data charges may apply. Check with your carrier for details.

--------------------------------------------------------------
We're always excited to hear from you! Please feel free to contact us via:

Email: support@justalk.com

Instagram: @justalk_app

Facebook: @justalkapp

Twitter: @JusTalkApps
---------------------------------------------------------------

The following is a more detailed description:

Free Phone Calls
Superior crystal-clear audio and high quality internet calling app, totally free HD video calls* and live chat video. The line in JusTalk is always unblocked. 

Group Video Calling App & Group Messenger
Experience life events with your family & friends together on JusTalk with no distance no matter you‚Äôre at the commencement, celebrating a Christmas house party and so on.

Capture the Moment
Quickly snap a photo or video and save these to camera roll or send to chats.

Online Meetings
Make a conference call or group calls, with voice or video calling. It's not just a free calling app, but a free cloud meeting app for team collaboration as well. JusTalk helps you create a real group face time with your colleagues.

Address Book Integration
Easily invite and add your friends to JusTalk by syncing your phone contacts or login with Facebook account. You can send an invitation to your friends by SMS, Mail, social networks, etc.

Free Texting
Can't take the call? Respond with a free text messaging.  
Call declined? Send a private text with all the important details directly.

Interactive Video Features
Top voip free calling apps, you can also tell short stories to your loved one by sharing story pictures.

Low Data Usage
Save 40-90% of the voip or vowifi network traffic during realtime video calling with 720P HD quality. Like a fun video walkie talkie.

Block Strangers
Block calls easily, just add the unwanted number or caller id to your blacklist.

comments: The app is good considering it is free. Its easy to use and the video call quality is not bad. I downloaded the app mainly because my four friends and i wanted to talk while in shut down due to the Corona virus and this app allows to do that. I am content with it.

Used to be my go to app for calls with family and friends. However, after the last update, I cannot connect my Bluetooth headphones to the app any more. I do a lot of commute and connecting to my Bluetooth headphones was always an awesome experience. Not anymore I'm afraid. Everytime I make call the app would switch from Bluetooth to speaker as soon as my call was answered. Please fix this issue! I'm bound to use other apps with mediocre calling experience until this issue is fixed.

Its agood app really really fun and enjoyable I'm pretty sure a couple updates and it would be great I mean you can text ,call,play games!!I love it it's such a good idea for when you are waiting for a friend to come back and you can just play a game or draw while you wait!!!its such a great app it definitely deserves the hype it doesn't get!!!!!ü¶Ñ‚ù§‚ù§üëâüëà‚ù§‚ù§ü¶Ñ

We had a good time with our group video chat, the sound and images were a little laggy, but over all this worked well. Also, you can only see six ppl on the screen and the rest are squished to the side.

This is one great app for sharing moments with your loved ones when you cant be there with them . great video quality but cant talk on mic because of major feed back from back ground noise . if this could be elevatied it would be great .

comments: First off, do you really have to have an ad after EVERY SINGLE ROUND? And on the menu, too??? The game was overall pretty glitchy, and you can tell you aren't playing with real people because if you are super far ahead from everyone else the leaderboard already has the stats. Another thing: why are the girl and boy as well as the bystanders all white? The game itself was pretty boring.

So many ads. After every level there is an ad. There is just way too many and it's really annoying. And it's just a bad game in general. Like, who would make a game about water slides and making you jump across them just to come first and some of the a.i names are weird. I was playing and it said the names were princess,pirate,sniper,deathbeast and worst of all the name pro in all caps. There that's my review. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS GAME IS BAD IN MY OPINION! Just take it from me.

As we all know, It's obvious by now we are all playing with bots. When you get Far away from everyone, the "Players" Teleport to you and don't even try. YOU DON'T KNOW HOW MANY TIMES I HAVE FAILED BECAUSE OF THIS. Also I see the same people like every two rounds. Like, "Dad", "Bae", and imagineYOU. Seriously, What is your reputation Aquapark.io? I have even told my siblings MULTIPLE times, "I think people are just getting paid to act like their players".. And Ofcourse I was right. Bye.

I like this app! Although there are some pros and cons. Pros are, I like the design of this game and it's pretty addicting. Cons, most of the computer programmed characters literally teleport! I'd jump off the slide and be about half the slide away from them and just like that they'd appear right beside me. When I would jump, the game would suddenly become very laggy. Please fix this.

This is the worst games I have ever played! The graphics are worser then my 4 year old sisters drawing! And it seems like the game is just about ads! It's glitchy and the first thing I got it it took a hour for it to open do not recomend itüò°

title: Fit the Fat 2
description:
Our friend loves to eat. Exercise? Eh‚Ä¶not so much.  Actually, he‚Äôs 507 lbs.

Did we mention he loves to eat?

The thing is ‚Äì he wants to get fit! To do that he needs your help.

So be prepared to:

‚Ä¢ Get your friend out of bed, and do some physical activities.
‚Ä¢ Get him running on the treadmill, lifting weights, or maybe jumping rope and boxing.
‚Ä¢ Make sure he gets enough food after the workout, and a good night's sleep to recover his stamina.
‚Ä¢ And please ‚Äì don't forget to have fun!

Other features include:

‚Ä¢ Exercise tracking with Google Fit, so if you exercise in real life, your friend will lose weight in the game as well.
‚Ä¢ Funny costumes for your friend, such as a basketball player, clown, soldier and more.
‚Ä¢ Stunning graphics that make playing the game fun each time you pick up your phone.
‚Ä¢ Share your friend's best moments and progress as he keeps losing weight!

Dare to take the challenge? Develop that perfect exercise diet that will really help your friend shed those pounds.

comments: Good, simple solitaire app. Only issue I have is that sometimes, after pausing and coming back, a column of stacked cards might become immovable (so the level may become impossible).

I downloaded this game with great expectations. It was an advertisement on another game. It showed a game with changing flower scenes. A great letdown. A blank green background was all there was and no way to click onto settings. Unenstalled!
The numbers are too small without my reading glasses. However I love the game, wish I didn't have to squint when I play in bed.
Fun game. I usually play with 2 suits but this game starts you with only one suit. I wish I had access to the settings so I could change the number of suits.
I really like the leveling system and the unlockables but I really wish there was a way to play in landscape mode. The cards are also too small.

comments: I like the game but it keeps freezing up on me. I have to close it and reopen it several time before it starts working again. Very frustrating. It flashes like a card is stuck during a move. It also has a lot of adds. It seems like there is an add between every game you play.

The cards are too small for me to see. Theres an add in there that makes you THINK you have to update this app...but its not..its a download of another game like it. And I have to watch 3 to 4 adds before playing this game. I understand adds and why they are there....but this is Rediculous. I even have patience with adds but I watch more adds than play the game NOPE..NOT FOR ME.

Fun game, beautiful backgrounds, ad for I Am Legend inappropriate. I tried to take a screen shot, but the ad wouldn't let me. Possibly because it is for ages 18 and over, which is stated on the ad. A girl strips down to her underwear. As she strips down completely, it blurs. Then it says I am Legend.

Finally a card game I actually like , the best card games for me in 1 place, the adverts were really annoying but for ¬£1.79 you can stop them well worth the money to play if you like these card games , daily challenges, awesome, would recommend to anyone that likes cards. Would be awesome if you added more games like scorpion and addiction
Way too many ads which make playing unenjoyable and annoying. I don't mind a few ads but this is ridiculous.

title: Word Beach: Fun Relaxing Word Search Puzzle Games
description:
Best game to learn English!

Play new word games in Word Beach üèñÔ∏è! Word jumble and brain games fans will love these hidden word puzzles. Unscramble words and connect letters to test your puzzle & vocabulary skills.

The word search doesn‚Äôt end once you‚Äôve crossed words off your word list - there‚Äôs still more to find! Find hidden words in one of the best word scramble tropical games out there!

Word Beach is a relaxing tropical vacation on your phone. Unscramble letters to find words to test your vocabulary skills! Find hidden words in the word puzzles in your fruit plate, as well as even a few secret ones.

The spelling games start out easy, but you‚Äôll soon be solving challenging scrambles to cross words off! These vocabulary games take you deep into the jungle to find more and more challenging word puzzles! üå¥

Play word games to connect letters and unscramble jumbled words! Find words and test your brain in Word Beach, from the makers of Pictoword!

Word Beach Word Scramble Games Features:

Free Word Puzzles
- Unscramble Words: Find and unscramble letters
- Find Words: Unscramble to find secret words
- Word Search: Find words in the list to complete the level
- Spelling Games: Cross words off your list to fill Polly‚Äôs Smoothie

Relaxing, Tropical Games
- Word search: Letters will appear on your fruit plate all mixed up!
- Tropical Locations: unscramble words and solve puzzles in exotic locations
- Vocabulary game: fill the smoothie with the words you find

Find Hidden Words
- Unscramble Letters: Keep connecting letters until you find them all!
- Word Guessing Games: Swipe letters to spell & unscramble words!
- Spelling game: scramble the letters for a new perspective!

Find the Word
- Create Words: Connect the letters to create words.
- Word Search Challenge: Find hidden words, cross them off your list, and add to your hidden list!
- Word Unscramble: Swipe and connect to unscramble words
- Jumble Word Game: See what you can make from these jumbled letters!

Word Puzzles
- Word Challenge: Come back to challenge yourself daily and receive huge rewards!
- Word puzzle got you stuck? Use your coins to ask for a hint!
- Vocabulary games with no time limit: Don‚Äôt worry about the time - none of the puzzles have time limits, so there‚Äôs no pressure.
- New Puzzles Games: Puzzles are added all the time!

If you love fun word games download Word Beach and become the unscramble master! Word Beach, from the makers of Pictoword, is the best puzzle word game out there!

recentChanges:
The 1st release of Word Beach in 2020 comes packed with the following:
* 60 new puzzles! Travel to the Canary Islands and explore 6 scenic places found there!

comments: The idea is good and it is an enjoyable game. Until you progress quite a way and the number of words that are apparently not real words (like 'read' and 'meat') increases and made up words like 'bro' and 'sis' become more prevalent. It makes for a very frustrating game. I also find words accepted on one level but not the next, adding to the frustration. If these were sorted out, it would be a good game.

From a stroked person's viewpoint: Word beach is quite perfect to play with. It's cool, clear and big enough for my defective eyesight. For almost 9 months of looking word puzzle game to play with, word beach is a game i love to play with to the finish. I will make additional observation/comment as the game continue. . .

Awesome word puzzle game! It stands out from others like it because of the graphics! They are excellent! Really beautiful backgrounds too. One thing that I don't like is that there are FAR TOO MANY ads! Thus, the 4 stars. Overall, a very well done word game! üòä

Enjoying game overall. Finding the pop up marvellous, well done etc captions extremely annoying. I get it is to boost confidence, hence making you feel good about yourself. Unnecessary to me. As per usual ads are prolific. Designed to encourage players to purchase full game experience. To install game developer gets data which converts to money. Ads make extra revenue supposedly to keep game free. What a crock
Really enjoy the game. Wish I didn't have to pay(real cash)every time my piggy bank is full. Why can't we use the coins we've already earned ?

title: Word Swipe Connect: Crossword Puzzle Fun Games
description:
Can you solve all of the thousands of anagram word puzzles? Word Swipe Connect Crossword Puzzle Fun Games is both challenging and relaxing to simultaneously stimulate and relax your mind.

This new take on word search games combines all the best elements of crossword, word search, anagram, scramble, text twist and word puzzle games. Over 1000 free puzzles set against beautiful and serene settings. Escape the stress of the real world as you exercise your brain with an endless supply of fun words puzzles.

‚óÜ Completely free to play. Easy to pickup, too addictive to put down!
‚óÜ Drag your finger over the letters to create a word. Connect and cross words in the grid to complete the puzzle.
‚óÜ Over 1,000 hand crafted puzzles featuring a dictionary of over 80,000 unique words.
‚óÜ Find bonus words to rack up coins for hints.
‚óÜ Relaxing and inspiring soundtrack adds to the atmosphere and immersion.
‚óÜ Free updates with more themes, puzzles, music, and features!
‚óÜ Calm your mind with beautiful landscape backgrounds featuring three chapters each.
‚óÜ Puzzles ranging from three letters all the way to ten letters. How many puzzles will you solve? See if you can connect them all.
‚óÜ Train your brain with an expanded vocabulary.
‚óÜ Familiar word search and crosswords rules, but in an entirely new kind of game.
‚óÜ Escape the stress of your daily life by playing just 5 minutes a day.

If you enjoy word games, puzzle games, crossword puzzles, word search, anagrams, scrambles, jumbles, text twist, and brain training exercises, you‚Äôll love Word Swipe Connect: Crossword Puzzle Fun.

Start solving today!

Be sure to leave a positive review if you enjoy the game. Thank you for playing. Also be sure to check out more games from Fun Free Games.

comments: Original review (‚≠ê‚≠ê): I enjoyed the game, but the egregious 30-second ads after every game were unbearable and unacceptable. Uninstalled! Update: So, I enjoyed the game so much that, two days later, I tried it again. I still hate the long ads, but now, after 5 seconds, you can get out of them. I'm very happy that I reinstalled Word Swipe Connect. I enjoy this game *very* much, and now I highly recommend it!

Love background beutifull. Best of all good contrast and size of letters. Much easier to see. Love the fire works. More choices of games to play. I don't think this will get boaring. First day playing. Will update .
Great game! If you love words , then this is the game for you. I get hours of enjoyment!!
Great game. Worth a 5 star rating....great job..well done.
Fun but running slow...May be my system, may need to reboot...

comments: Want to know why your app is rated so low and doesn't have more downloads? It's not the quality of the app but the RIDICULOUS subscription price. You really believe your customers think $19.99 a MONTH or $99.99 a YEAR is reasonable for a coloring app?? Do you not realize that if the price was substantially lower the number of "VIP" users would be so many that it would take care of the difference in price? What a shame. I would have loved to be a VIP but not at that price. WOW...
Love the wide variety of pictures. Plus the option to sign in through facebook and download really great pics ti have even more of a option selection

This app has a lot of issues. Sometimes it just closes, sometimes you have to keep tapping for something to happen. This is what happened to me when it "stuck" and I kept tapping. Before I knew it, I had bought a "subscription" of some sort. I have tried to contact the developer twice without any success to get a refund. It cost me $105.00! I'm on disability and my husband had back surgery. That $105.00 was for bills. I have no idea how to get that back. And I have no idea what I bought!!!

Several pix will go to number 12 or13 then shut down and when return to site all colors are gone NOT HAPPYalso I had 9 hints built up and they all disappeared now having problem with all again NOT HAPPY
I re-downloaded it but it still is horrible! No Disney coloring pages as shown in the ads and you only get 100 free coloring then have to watch an ad to get more steps to color. LAME!

title: Make It Rain: The Love of Money - Fun & Addicting!
description:
Are you a fan of casual games that are so addicting they‚Äôre hard to put down? Then swipe your boredom away with Make it Rain: The Love of Money! It‚Äôs a fiendishly clever clicker game that‚Äôs super simple to pick up, hard to master, and crazy addicting to play! Swipe and watch the money pile up into the hundreds, thousands, millions, kili-billies and beyond.

Make some wise or shady investments to earn all that money ‚Äì you‚Äôre a capitalist, so act like one! Tap tap tap to get rich, establish a capitalist legacy, then kick the bucket as an old goat mega-billionaire with loads of money. Pass your money on to the next generation and let the capitalist adventure begin again!

Hit it rich or swipe to expand your fortune as you play free addicting games on Make it Rain: The Love of Money!

Make it Rain Features:

Swipe to make it rain cash and coins!
- Investment games have never been so addicting ‚Äì or free! Swipe and pile up the free money.
- Clicker game that will make you rich! Well, technically not real money... but at least you‚Äôll have piles of virtual cash each time you play this addicting game!
- Swipe as fast as you can to collect that sweet, sweet money!

Investment games that make bank!
- Investments are the ultimate step in your capitalist adventure.
- Make smart investments to earn cash even when the addicting game is closed!
- Clicker game lets you invest in venture capital, loan sharking, or offshore drilling.
- Swipe your way to millions when you start a lemonade stand, cash casino or clown college.
- Just tap tap tap to buy off a federal judge as the money continues to roll in!

Establish a capitalist legacy to get bonuses!
- Swipe, steal and cheat to your heart‚Äôs content to keep that money flowing in this frantic clicker game.
- As a capitalist, make friends in Congress or become an institutional investor to grow your fortune.

Pass on your cash cow when you R.I.P.

- Pass on your cash cow to your family and snatch up tons of bonuses.
- Swipe, tap and watch your fortune grow as each family member lets the money pile up!


Oh, and be a smart cookie and buy that vault. Even a capitalist as vibrant and dashing as you can‚Äôt keep tap tap tapping forever‚Ä¶

Download Make it Rain: The Love of Money and start raking in the mega-billions! It‚Äôs as easy as 1, 2, 3!

comments: This game is fun, except for the fact whoever designed the layout of the game screen didn't count for the ad space at the bottom of the screen. There are times where the ads cover the second row of letters and you can't see them. It's an additional game of trial and error to try figure out what the letters are, without triggering the ad below. If this could be fixed the score for this game would be much higher than two stars. EDIT 1/10/20: This went up to four stars.
Following on from my previous review I've just realised the ad at the bottom is not there all the time, don't know why you don't just remove it altogether....
This game is really fun! It's the right amount of challenging to make it fun to guess the icon.
I enjoyed it up until level 6 where the game purposefully moves the letters down so you buy the ad free version.

Exaxtly as desceibed. Shows you an image of a brand; for example- the McDonalds arch a d you have a selection of jumpled letters to choose from in order to input the correct name of the shown image brand's name or charcater. So far have made it to level 7 & the game has not yet to pose much of a challqnge so it is easy to loose interest in. However i am still going to give it a 5 star rating based on the fact the game play is exactly what one would be looking for in a game like guess the icon.

comments: I love this game because the game is silly and the game is playing fair and also I like about this game is because there are boss battles that you can fight and when you win, you get so excited when you beated the boss and this game is sometimes hard because the minion goes fast and sometimes really really fast so I would probably focus if I were you. This is so fun and you can change your minion and some of the suits are really really cute and the best part I like is you can catch the bananas.

This game is really awesome.üòäüòä....atleast it's ending ...you just have to run to complete missions in many different rooms and win different prizes...including prize pods...the special thing is that we don't have to buy costumes...we can get the cards of the costume by completing missions or from proze pods..

Regarding some user's comments. It doesn't cheat you. Right after you clicked the ad for the double coins it gives you that amount, and after you watched it you get the same amount..again! So , 20 coins when clicked for double coins, and other 20 after you watched the ad. Just watch your coins before and after every race. Good game btw!
Game is amazing but one time there was a bug,so I had to delete it. When I reinstalled it, it wouldn't connect to the server after literally 1 hour.

I used to love this game, however recent updates have made this game uneventful and a waste of time. I do not appreciate how we are not allowed to run without completing a mission. The missions make the run very short and take the fun out of this game. Some of the missions are completely and utterly stupid. I will say that the theme and graphics of this game are amazing, but I do hope that you will remove missions in the future. Please take the time to read player reviews and revise your game.

title: Daily Themed Crossword - A Fun crossword game
description:
A fun crossword game with each day connected to a different theme. Choose from a range of topics like Movies, Sports, Technology, Games, History, Architecture and more!

Access to hundreds of puzzles, right on your Android device, so play or review your crosswords when you want, wherever you want! 

Give your brain some exercise and solve your way through brilliant crosswords published every day!

Increase your vocabulary and general knowledge. Become a master crossword solver while having tons of fun, and all for free!

Daily Themed Crossword features :

-Fun puzzles for everyone.

-A new puzzle everyday, 365 days a year.

-Get rewards for playing daily.

-Hints to get you past those obscure words.

-Each day of the week has a theme attached to it.

-Hard enough to keep you interested and easy enough to keep you coming back.

-Learn about famous personalities, events, discoveries and loads of new words.

Download Daily Themed Crossword now, join thousands of crossword enthusiasts and see why everyone is hooked! 

Write back to us with any issues or suggestions, we are all ears!

recentChanges:
Bug fixes
