comments: Okay but they have the exact same words over and over. Ads aren't too horrible, although there are a bit of them, especially if you want to do another puzzle. Even the themed mini puzzles which you would think all the words would stick to the theme, there's only two words that are in line with the theme. Not too hard, but not great either. If you like doing the same words over and over, this app is for you.

Repeats many of the same words in puzzles often..like Uma (Thurman) as well as a few others and once you finish a game you cannot exit..the exit button is not clickable..only return to game. Some of the game questions like the ones about authors or sports players I feel are not very well known people and are very difficult. I do like that it does fill in some letters once you complete a word.

Awesome game that I can play for hours, BUT puzzles are limited and you need coins to play once you've gone thru all the free puzzles. If you watch an ad, you only get 5 coins, but puzzles take 10 or 20. Need better options to play free, unless the whole thing is designed to get you to spend money on coins which I'm definitely NOT keen on. I would definitely give 5 stars if that was fixed.

The videos you have to watch for coins, if you dont want to pay real money (which i dont) dont always run all the way through. I think i have watched what i am allowed to watch of every one of the videos available. They play up to a point - different each time, then start over or screen goes blank, you are asked to input contact info or buy. After that inconvenience you dont always get your coins and you lose possible stars because you have wasted time trying to watch videos. 3/5/20. Ditto.

It's fun and there's a good mix of easy and hard questions. However I hate the set up. They have the hint things at the very bottom right where you hold your phone so they're easy to accidentally press wasting your coins and hints when you don't need them. It's frustrating. It's also weird how the games are set up in trying to figure out which ones are currently available to play.

title: Ninja Race - Fun Run Multiplayer
description:
RACE REAL PEOPLE IN REAL-TIME. 

Ninja Fun Race is a live, multiplayer racing game featuring unique Ninja Characters. 
You'll race against three real people, including your Facebook friends and random opponents. 
The action is real-time. 

Jump over obstacles to overtake your opponents. 
Shoot rockets, portals & throwing stars at players ahead of you to knock them back. Drop punch boxes to slow competitors behind you. 
Outfit your character in Ninja Garbs and other fun costumes. 
Taunt the competition. 
Join a league and climb the leaderboards. 
Jump on in.

comments: Last time played this game it went down. Out of curiosity I happened to look. From ninja jump, nine jump. What ever it name was. Till this. Great come back. New graphics. My only 1 down fall is the speed.to me the game was a little faster. But not by much..., and miss my old profile. Great fun family friend, rival challenge game...

Its cool and the characters is awesome. The Boosters is super great and the rank. And add a sword button if you are the front of the ninja and he come in you, the character you use can attack/slay/swipe the sword the player using the button.And i love it. Its the best racing game, ninja game, action game, ever. And the custumes is great. Its fun and addicting racing game.

This is originally a Ninjump Dash game as a sequel to the ninjump franchise,I still remember playing this game like 5 years ago,what happened? Why change name? Why all ninjump game removed? Anyway I search for this game and turns out it changes its name tho,still a fun game,nice :).

Overall the game is pretty good, it's a good time killer when I'm on my breaks at work. My only issue is that it seems like it takes way to long to find opponents, but I think it has a small player base. Looking forward to updates or a sequel
Am happy to see this game back, but there is game to play online, i was looking for server from 5 minutes and still not got to play online. Advertising game may help.

title: Paddington‚Ñ¢ Run: Endlessly fun adventures
description:
Enjoy this fun-filled endless runner adventure based on the award-winning Paddington movie! Run through the busy streets of London to collect the delicious marmalade, beat challenges and unlock exciting new features in each action-packed level.

Along the way, you‚Äôll collect lots of different costumes, handy boots and mystery boxes to help you conquer challenges. Kids and adults alike will enjoy the different mini-games that can be discovered throughout the game to help them collect even more marmalade and tokens!

TAKE A FUN RUN
‚Ä¢ Easy controls that anyone can pick up and play
‚Ä¢ Endless fun with lots of new challenges to discover
‚Ä¢ Smooth gameplay for an immersive experience
‚Ä¢ Quick play sessions for any time you fancy a game

THE LONDON RUSH
‚Ä¢ Run through the bustling streets of London 
‚Ä¢ See London‚Äôs iconic landmarks and visit Paddington‚Äôs home at Windsor Gardens 
‚Ä¢ Dodge the city‚Äôs iconic black taxis and double-decker buses

COSTUMES, BOOTS AND MINI-GAMES
‚Ä¢ Fancy a new costume? There are over 18 to collect, each with a splendid perk!
‚Ä¢ Upgrade boots that help Paddington grab extra tokens, bounce over trouble and make almost any challenge easy 
‚Ä¢ Discover mini-games throughout each level to unlock the Jet Ski, Skateboard and other fun games!

So, ready for a run? Let‚Äôs get started!

comments: Absolutely love Paddington but the game is too glitchy. Paddington falls through the floor for no given reason, I sometimes can't move Paddington even when I've swiped the screen for him to move and sometimes I can't activate the boots even when I should be allowed to. title: Fun Flight
description:
Star Blast: Galaxy star shooter


Year 5000, humanity has detected a large number of floating stars moving towards the earth. It‚Äôs when the era of mankind‚Äôs fighting for survival begins. As a senior captain, you are called to protect the safety of the earth.

Star Blast: Galaxy star shooter is a combination of classic shoot‚Äòem-up game plus a variety of playing modes. It is an awesome time-killer game with unpredictable fun for all ages.  Featuring:

-Easy control: Just swipe the screen with one finger, you will have endless fun.
-Powerful weapons: Various weapons are supplied of your choice, mount them on and destroy the stars.
-A wide range of stars: The gear star can accelerate unintentionally. The Healer star can cure itself continuously. Find them out in your adventure!

I was told that the developers were working on a fix, but it still doesn't work and they won't refund me.

I hope the developers put some effort into it and fix the bugs, instead of just releasing new decks. Until then, it's useless.

Someone seriously needs to get the bugs out of this game!

title: Pocoyo Run & Fun
description:
The most fun and exciting racing game is here!

Pocoyo Run & Fun is a fast and casual game to play for free, whenever and wherever you want, with one hand.

Jump with your shopping cart at full speed down the mountainside and don't let the avalanche of little green aliens catch you.

Use the advantages you can get with the extra characters to go even faster, avoid obstacles and discover new tricks and powerups.

Jump at the right time for incredible poses and acrobatics. Try to discover them all, there are many surprises hidden.

Run to collect the coins and redeem them for upgrades and get even further!

 - "Endless run" game based on fluid physics.
 - Land generated procedurally. There will not be two equal matches!
 - Simple controls, easy to play but with depth of gameplay.
 - System of tricks and pirouettes, fun and challenging.
 - Colorful and fun visual design.
 - Wide variety of objectives and missions that will unlock achievements and rewards.
 - Hundreds of hours of speed, laughter and fun!

A game for players of all ages: fun and challenging for kids and adults.

title: Paint Free - Drawing Fun
description:
Paint Free is one of the best fun painting and drawing app or sketching app on Play Store. You can use their fingers or a stylus to draw beautiful drawings and unleash your creativity and entertain yourself at the same time. It's simple and fun to use, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this app. Paint is absolutely lite weight and completely free app which can be used for educating and introducing someone to drawing right from your phones or tablets. You can use this to practice the alphabet and numbers and paintings.

This app has a simple and easy to use design. It is not confusing and easily recognisable  icons are used in the app which makes it easy for everyone to use. This is a single screen and one click app, you land on the app and can start using it as soon as you click on app icon, no annoying welcome screens or button clicks required to actually start working on the app.

WE WILL NEVER SHOW YOU FULL SCREEN ADS, WE KNOW THEY ARE ANNOYING AND BREAK THE FLOW OF USER ESPECIALLY KIDS.

Key Features of Application

- Paint Free is one of the best painting or drawing apps for you to unleash their creativity.
- You can draw beautiful pictures and paintings with over 20 colors.
- This App offers you a white background to start fresh drawing on.
- Using Paint Free you can Save and Share the picture through social media.
- Paint Free offers multiple brush and eraser sizes for a great experience.
- Paint Free is a lightweight paint app which hardly takes any space on your device.
- Paint Free works on both phones and Tablets.
- Best suited for phones having a screen size greater than or equal to 4 inches.

You can share your images on Pinterest board or Google Plus Collection, below are the links.

https://in.pinterest.com/besteapplications/app-kids-paint-drwaing-fun/

https://plus.google.com/u/0/collection/sr5PZE

Please share this app if you like it. Happy painting everyone.

recentChanges:
Bug Fixes & Improvements

Thank you for playing Color Bump 3D!
comments: Used to be a fun relaxing chill game. Then the rules changed...now you have to start the level ALL OVER IF YOU LOSE. Used to be your "best" line was where you started from. Now it only serves to taunt you as you have trouble getting back to it. Also, the controls leave MUCH to be desired once you reach higher levels. EXTREMELY tight fits are unwelcome in a chill game such as this. I will never understand what goes through some people's minds. "Look our game is doing well. Let's make it worse."

I am not much for mobile games, but I love this game! I am on level 506 by now and have had it downloaded longer than any other mobile game I can remember. I enjoy the updates that has added more colors and sounds and the bonus coin stages are brilliant. It is simple and challenging the further I get along. Can't wait to see what comes next. Keep up the great work! Update: Now on level 1007 and still my go to time killer

It looked really really fun on a YouTube ad but I played it and it's EXTREMELY laggy and has an ad after every fail wich makes it worse. I know you have to make your money but the lagging is to much. Someone else mentioned it and I wanted to at least give it a try. Next time,hopefully, I download it it'll have it fixed cause I really want to play it.

Update: I don't like the new updates to the game. You have to restart at the beginning everytime you die and the controls are touchy. I can be nowhere near a object if another color and I die. They removed what made me like the game. I'll keep checking back but as of now, I'm disappointed. I'm really liking the new update so far! I like this game. I like the game play and for the lack of a better word, physics of it. Pay the money to kill the ads, it's worth it.

Fun game, I'd give it a 5/5, minus the fact that I've been stuck on a level so long it's just annoying. No option to continue at current marker in level has ever popped up. Only option is to start over.......and over and over and over. Also, what's with the gold coins......you can't use them for anything except the floor pattern. It'd be nice if you could use them to continue on in the level.

comments: I used to play this game when I was 9 years old. I loved how it was before, it was like a drawing media, it was amazing, but when my mon bought me a new phone, I tried to download the game again but it became very different, It's not that fun as it used to before. Please bring back the old "Draw somrthing 2" I don't know why you changed it, but that was better than what it is now

I used to love this app! Especially when they had Draw Something 2. This one lacks the drawing tools, so you just have one type of thing to draw with. I hate that they added ads! They never had this before, and you can't exit out fast. Like I get when you want extra bombs or coins to watch an ad, but for everyone else, just let us skip it! Kind of disappointed with how it is now. I wish they could bring back draw something 2.

The game itself is fun. Too bad the company is worried more about the ads that are clicked on than the enjoyment of the customer base because it randomly brings up ads in the middle of you drawing without you actually clicking on the ad at the bottom. All of my friends have noticed the same thing and agree it's annoying and the reason they stopped playing.

I used to love this game but it completely sucks now. I had to log back in after getting a new phone and it deleted all my games and the colors I bought. I haven't logged out recently but all my stuff is gone again. It keeps crashing now and splitting my drawing in half. It's also VERY slow and glitchy. I completely gave up. Worst app.

Finally found out how to turn off the random games. That option alone makes this game 100% better. Still, I am disappointed with the insane words chosen for the heroines and the girl power specials. How am I supposed draw words like care and bravery?!? Really? Out of all the awesome things that women do we have to go with such words?

title: What if..
description:
What if.. is a question game where you say "Yes" or "No" to casual, personal, challenging and crazy questions and immediately see how other players answered! Perfect for parties as well as for just passing time. You have nothing to lose, try it out!

What if‚Ä¶ you could extend your lifespan with 20 healthy years.
But‚Ä¶ you step on a piece of lego every day when you least expect it.


The world says: 46% Yes, 54% No

¬†‚Ä¢ With 100,000+ questions and new every day the fun never ends!
¬†‚Ä¢ Share questions with your friends and see what they answer!

¬†‚Ä¢ 150000+ positive reviews

summary: What if you could know what the whole world thinks? But...
recentChanges:

comments: What if... is a lovely app that serves its purpose and has a personable touch to it that gives the impression of caring developers. The intention was well executed and this app gives insight into the choices others would make vs your own. Would recommend for passing time and idle amusement. Also note: no intrusive ads, friendly and upbeat vibe, simple controls.

Facebook login doesn't even work. It keeps saying "something screwed up and I don't know what". So you can't create questions unless you're connected to Facebook, yet it doesn't even work when trying to connect! I'm not the only one having this issue either. There should also be a way to create a user account, or connect with your google account instead. Fix this and I'll update to 5 stars.

When i got to the question 'What if you could make three kind app developers very happy but you have to give them a high rating' nd when i pressed yes it was pretty much expected you sent me here. But about the game in all its fun and slightly addicting, theres levels you can get to that give you not only entertainment, but a goal to follow. Which is what makes most what if or would you rather games boring, you dont have a reason to be there. But you, three kind app developers, deserve 5 stars.‚ù§

This game is fun to play with friends while drinking. I would have rated it 4 stars but the I gave 5 stars for the developers and their sense of humor. I genuinely like this game. My only problem with it is that after a while it sort of gets boring. My suggestion to make it better? Crank up on the REAL fun What If's (Rated R)

I've only been playing this game for five minutes and I have to say, it is better than I expected. And LOL to to the point when the What If asked me to do a rating üòÇ. I haven't encountered any bugs yet, but I hope I do so I can make this comment more useful.. but that's all for now! :D

Reflexes and reaction times will be challenged and put to the test as the never-ending onslaught gets faster and faster!

title: Puxers - The fun brain game
description:
Simple action packed, bubble shooting, number matching, puzzle game that is easy to learn but hard to master.  Pull to aim and release to shoot. Use your skill and logic to match equal numbers to make higher numbered pucks.

You haven‚Äôt played anything quite like this game before - One-part bubble shooter, one-part air hockey, one-part billiards and pool mixed with the number merging fun of 2048 you won‚Äôt want to put this game down. 

This unique mix of arcade gameplay, strategy and numbers is fun and will stimulate your brain. If you like to play with physics and ricochet games such as Bubble Witch Saga, Angry Birds, or Panda Pop then Puxers is for you. Do you like mind and number games like 2048? Play Puxers the digit-disc game that‚Äôs great for kids and adults.

The more numbers you match the higher your score and the more Crowns you collect. Collect Crowns to become the true Puxers King! But beware, more pucks will come your way while you clear the board. Plan your shots carefully and play it smart, or it‚Äôs game over.


Features:

‚Ä¢ Action bubble shooting play
‚Ä¢ Strategic number matching
‚Ä¢ Simple to learn and challenging to master
‚Ä¢ Stimulate your brain and Improve cognitive skills;
‚Ä¢ Makes learning simple math fun!
‚Ä¢ Strengthen your reaction time;
‚Ä¢ Challenge your friends and Compete on leaderboards to show off your skills;
‚Ä¢ Only the true Puxers King will emerge in the end.

title: Multiplication Flash Cards Games Fun Math Practice
description:
Building math skills and learning to multiply has never been more fun and intuitive! 

With "Show Me" and "Peek" features, play comes easy even for young learners.

This app adheres to Common Core Standards for third grade math and was designed by parents and teachers. 

LEARNING TO MULTIPLY: 
‚Ä¢ Select a multiplier to practice specific equations
‚Ä¢ Choose the best number range for your skill level
‚Ä¢ "Show Me" option keeps cards face up for easier play  

BUILDING MATH SKILLS:  
‚Ä¢ Match equations to their answers
‚Ä¢ Match equations with the same answer 
‚Ä¢ Hear the numbers and equations as you touch them
‚Ä¢ Positive feedback and balloon popping rewards 

ADDITIONAL FEATURES: 
‚Ä¢ Items, numbers and instructions are professionally narrated 
‚Ä¢ Hints and options allow you to customize difficulty 
‚Ä¢ Discover new card designs and layouts as you play
‚Ä¢ Parental controls for sound, music, purchases and links
‚Ä¢ We do not collect personal information from our users

COMMON CORE STANDARDS:
‚Ä¢ CCSS.Math.Content.3.OA.A.4
‚Ä¢ CCSS.Math.Content.3.OA.B.5
‚Ä¢ CCSS.Math.Content.3.OA.B.6
‚Ä¢ CCSS.Math.Content.3.OA.C.7 

‚ÄúAs parents and teachers, we believe in friction-free learning for kids of all ages. We strive to build fun experiences with eye-popping visuals, professional narration, catchy music, and lots of positive encouragement.

Thank you for supporting us and making our vision come to life.

Have fun!!‚Äù

- Blake, Mike & Amanda, Eggroll Games

comments: This is great app so we paid the $1.99 for the rest of the app. Turns out that is lie. We have been charge $2.12 a week since we bought the app! When will we stop getting billed for this simple app that is well worth $2.00 but not worth $2.00 every week!! I want my money back! And how do I get the charges to stop?!

So I purchased the app. It's an OK app. But I wish it were more interactive. Meaning, when my nephew sees 4x4, and he says the correct answer out loud, the app recognizes it. And also, it would be awesome if you had the option of portrait mode instead of just landscape all the time. It's less awkward to hold your phone in portrait vs. landscape. Last, makes zero sense to me that addition/subtraction and multiplication/division are on separate apps. Feels like a cheap money grab. Note 10+
Great for memorizing and becoming efficient in multiplication with consistent practice.
paid for the full version, but cannot access it. i have been trying to get help with this for over 2 weeks.
Sometimes the cards get stuck at the bottom of the screen. We have to start over to fix it. Otherwise this is a great app üòÅ

title: My Boo - Your Virtual Pet Game
description:
Meet Boo, your very own virtual pet! Enjoy countless hours of fun in this addictive and entertaining game brought to you by Tapps Games!

Each Boo is like a real pet that needs lots of attention, and your task is to take care of it in the best way possible. Feed it, wash it, take care of its health, put it to sleep and play with your Boo - while you have lots of fun with over 20 thrilling mini games that will surely keep you entertained and your Boo happy as a puppy! 

If your Boo is hungry, you can find an array of delicious and nutritious food in the pantry: from yummy tacos to some tender barbecue ribs, or even a portion of octopus sashimi if you‚Äôre in the mood for a more exotic food! Your sweet tooth will be satisfied with mouthwatering candies, such as pumpkin pies, milk shakes and colorful lollipops!

You can also dress up your boo any way you like! Go to his closet and style it like your favourite movie or book character! Choose its hair and accessorize, from top hats to a regal crown, or even a leprechaun hat! Choose your attire! From formal to fun - and every style in between! You can buy new accessories to customize your Boo as you level up!  

Your boo will get dirty from time to time, and like any other pet, a bath is necessary! Taking care of your pet also entails giving it some medication whenever needed, and you can play with magic potions and energy drinks! You can also decorate its house with fun posters and decorative rugs - not to mention redo the walls with beautiful wallpaper and some fancy flooring! You‚Äôll LOVE this BOOtiful game so much, you won‚Äôt be able to leave it alone!

HIGHLIGHTS
‚Ä¢ ADOPT your Boo, give it a special name and watch it grow up! It‚Äôs so cute!
‚Ä¢ DRESS it up with countless outfits to give your Boo the best look! Just they way you want!
‚Ä¢ FEED Boo with candy, cookies, fruits, pizza or even sushi for a treat! Yummy!
‚Ä¢ TICKLE, play keepie uppie, trampoline or jump rope with your Boo to keep it happy and smiling!
‚Ä¢ TUCK your Boo in when the day is over and Boo is tired!
‚Ä¢ BATHE your Boo to keep it clean and happy!
‚Ä¢ DECORATE every room of your Boo's house with dozens of awesome items!

And a lot more! There‚Äôs always so much to do in My Boo!
You will never get tired of your cute little pet monster!

MINI GAMES
Have fun with exciting mini games and earn coins to buy items and food for your Boo!

‚Ä¢ Boo Mix - Match Boos
‚Ä¢ Piano Boo - Tap the Boos and avoid the white tiles
‚Ä¢ Basket Boo - How many points can you score in this basketball game?
‚Ä¢ Matching - A match-3 style game to combine Boos
‚Ä¢ Bubble Pop - Launch and combine Boos of the same color

And many more!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: This game is horrible for android devices!!!!!!!!!!!! If you have any kind of android device, DONT DOWNLOAD THE GAME!!!!! it doesn't finish loading. But NO I didn't even get the chance to play it and see what it was about, see if it was fun, or see if I would like the game, CAUSE I NEVER GOT THE CHANCE TO PLAY!!!!

I love the game it's just that I can't change the name of my boo. I tried to click the pencil on the right of the BOO ID CARD but when I start typing and erasing the existing BOO name, it doesn't work. For the next update, can you fix this problem. Thank you.

I love this app. This app has some flaws though. I can't change my boos name and there are just a bit to many adds. I use to have this app on IOS.I also had boo town to go with it so when I found out Android doesn't have it I was disappointed. You don't need to purchase anything with real money to get coins you just need to play. If the app makers see this please add boo town to Android I would love that it would me so much to me.But this is an over all good app.Hope this review helped you out.

Awesome!!! I love the mini-games, the Boos are adorable, and then you tap them play jump all around screen I love my boo she is adorable all the Boos are adorable and I love when you go outside. This game is amazing!!! It's the best game ever 5 stars for this game
I love this game so much it is super addicting and i love the little character. It is super easy to level up but there are a lot of levels in think there are 60 I seriously recommend this game!!!

title: Fun Hospital ‚Äì Tycoon is Back
description:
Welcome to Fun Hospital, one of the funniest hospital games ever in the world! Here, you might meet patients with a lot of hair, or no hair; strange aliens, evil guy, super hero‚Ä¶Build a sweet hospital of your own! And save these poor little patients!
 
üëÄ  BUILD YOUR OWN THEME HOSPITAL FREELY
There are plenty of rooms, decorations and facilities. To operate your dream hospital well, you need to decide which, where and when to build them to improve the performance and efficiency. 

üòâ  CREATE YOUR MEDICAL TEAM
Hire doctors, nurses and cleaners according to their capabilities, place them in right positions to save more lives! Train, equip and upgrade them to improve their performance. 

üò±  SET UP YOUR OWN SMART STRATEGY  
It is not a simple doctor game. To be a great hospital tycoon, as the manager you need to make right choices on your hospital design and strategy. Your doctors and nurses, buildings and decorations will have great impacts on the status of your hospital as well.  

üòÑ   CHALLENGE HUNDREDS OF DISEASES  
Upgrade your technology to unlock hundred diseases. Enjoy your idle time watching waves of cute little patients walking, sitting and receiving medical treatment in your hospital! It is your mission to save millions of lives. 

üòç  COMPETE TO EARN REWARDS
Create or join a union. Help your union mates and complete tasks to increase your union ranking in the weekly Medical Tournament! The Top Hospital Unions will make great money and trophies every week!

üòâ  A GREAT STORY IN FUN HOSPITAL 
If you‚Äôre a fan of online tycoon games then you‚Äôll LOVE this crazy hospital game! This wonderful theme hospital game has it all ‚Äì love story from different patients, stimulating storyline for the challenges, various role playing missions, exciting medical tournament and much more!

Tycoon is back! Fun Hospital is one of the greatest hospital games ever on mobile! üëá Build and operate your own theme hospital now with friends and family! 

Like us: www.facebook.com/FunHospitalClub
Email: feedback@oranges-game.com
FB messenger: hr@oranges-game.com

comments: Fun game, massive glitches. For instance, I started an emergency case but none of the emergency patients ever showed up in my hospital, so I wasn't able to cure any of them and failed. Another issue is that the diamonds (premium currency) cost WAY too much and everything cost too many diamonds.

Funny games for passing timeÔºåbut after level 20 it just became a waste of time to play with, it keep trying on push player to use real money to get the item, if not you will never have enough item to buy new place for your hospital and you will never level up others of the equipment if you don't use real money

Good game which you can play without spending money. Easy to play, nice graphics. I appreciate that the game does not force me to buy anything. Therefore I supported the developers and made couple of purchases.

DO NOT GET THIS GAME, PLEASE CHECK REVIEWS, After level 9 I invested some real money, then I close the game for about 1 week and coming back today got surprised that my account went back to level 0 losing everything including my money. THATS RUBBISH.

After reading other people's reviews, I guess when I first downloaded the game, I got logged in to someone else's account which wasn't played very far off so I didn't think much and played. I advanced quite far and even spent money on it. But all of a sudden I got logged out and now the account I'm playing has to be played from the start. So I lost my game and my money. First time I'm spending money on a game and this happens. Unbelievable...

title: Run
description:
Run.
Do not slow down.
Do not fall off.
Do not give up.

Run, the hit game from Kongregate comes to mobile for FREE!

FEATURES‚Ä®
* Find seven different allies and gain access to their unique talents!
* Watch out for breakable tiles! (Or don't. Repairing them is someone else's job.)
* Run and jump through a galaxy-spanning network of tunnels in Explore Mode. Good luck finding an unbroken path home!
* See how far you can get and climb the leaderboards through the ever-changing tunnels of Infinite Mode! It's not like you can get any more lost after Explore Mode... 
* Rock out to a stellar soundtrack!

comments: It is such a fun game! I am happy that you can change controls in settings because the one you get are soo hard. And there is sooo much character's! And plus there is like nooooo ads. And it is totally not glitchy. The only thing... when are you guys going to make a update? The last update was in 2018. And right now it is 2020. But I still like this game!! This is why I picked this game 5! Remember kids (or teenagers or ground ups) to ge TV this game! THIS GAME IS LIKE A TROPHY!

Great game, but unfortunately riddled with bugs, crashes, glitches, long (and often innapropriate) unskipable ads, and other things, sometimes make it borderline unplayable. Edit: Absolutely unplayable. The amount of crashes I've had with this is insane. Literally every time. I updated my phone and all of a sudden the game literally does not work. Downgraded to 1 star. Screw this.

Love > Lag This game is, without a doubt, one of my favourites; Run was great on Kongregate and fits greatly with a touch screen. While the game has a SUBSTANTIAL amount of lag (optimisation obviously wasn't in the minds of any of the developers) I still find myself wanting to play it which just speaks to the great gameplay!

I love it! I like how the characters in the game move. Sometimes I switch them to finish a hard level at different times. And I love how the tunnels are made! They are very creative to me! I actually have no problems with this game. Sometimes I even play this at school! I'm glad I downloaded this game!

Amazing game, wonderful graphics! So, so adicting! I gave it a five, but Lags now and then, but i really, really do recomend this game! I first played it on "cool math" I think this version is far more better! Lots more levels too! Charming cast of charicters, very fun way to spend time! Especally when you are in a car trip this game will KILL time! And unlike some other games, you wont get spamed with dumb ads. Its very hard for me to "like" a game, but i defenatly LOVE this game! Recomend it!

title: Hangman - Word Games
description:
Save Hangman from hanging on rope by finding the right word! Select a letter by tapping, but be careful you have limited number of wrong guesses per puzzle and hang man. There are plenty of hints to help you find the hidden word in word games. Great vocabulary learning game for kids. Classic hangman has word games for kids.

If you are looking for fun games and different games, than play this brain teasers games without internet and enjoy difficult games from 10 different topics including animals and sports. 

Hangman word game features:
- Great word game for adults and kids.
- Beautiful graphics and classic gameplay.
- Hangman in 10 different categories.
- Three levels of difficulty: easy, normal and hard.
- High Scores list for each difficulty level.
- Earn new hints at correct guesses!
- Play offline without internet.
- Very entertaining game. Difficult and different game.
- Different hangman games.
- Word games for kids and hangman games for adults.
- Most populer games and brain games for adults.

There are 10 different categories to choose from:
- Dictionary
- Hollywood
- Sports
- Countries
- Foods
- Travel
- Kitchen
- Clothes
- Animals

title: Face Fun - Photo Collage Maker
description:

title: rif is fun for Reddit
description:
"rif is fun"‚Äîaka "RIF" and formerly "reddit is fun"‚Äîgives you a fast and intuitive interface to reddit.com.

Want early access to new features? Use this beta opt-in link: https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.andrewshu.android.reddit

Now includes TABLET support and WIDGET! And Moderator features!

Cross-device HISTORY SYNC via synccit.com!
Set it up in Menu->Settings->Synccit

Permissions:
‚Ä¢ INTERNET - The Internet
‚Ä¢ BOOT - to restore mail notifications on device boot
‚Ä¢ EXTERNAL STORAGE - thumbnail caching
‚Ä¢ ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - detect connection speed for OPTIONAL ads
‚Ä¢ GET_ACCOUNTS - associate Google account with custom themes
‚Ä¢ MANAGE_ACCOUNTS, AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS, USE_CREDENTIALS - add reddit accounts to system Account Manager
‚Ä¢ VIBRATE - for mail notifications
‚Ä¢ NFC - share current page via NFC
‚Ä¢ READ_SYNC_SETTINGS, WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS - sync web preferences with reddit.com
‚Ä¢ BILLING - purchase Reddit Gold, and premium custom themes (but currently all themes are free)
‚Ä¢ WAKE_LOCK - for various background processing (e.g., mail check, widget) supporting Android 8.0

comments: I used this app for a long time because I enjoyed the customization and simplicity of it. I bought pro right off the bat because I liked that I could remove ads. Well, they have apparently decided the revenue stream from ads is good enough that they would force you to have ads if you wanted the customization, even if you already bought pro. Too bad they're going to lose users because there are other apps out there that don't force that. I'm out. Enjoy the money you got from me for pro.

The app stops loading and you have to refresh it from time to time. Ive used this app on 3 different phones. At first I thought it was my phone with poor connection but after having the same problem with different phones and service, it turns out it was the app. Makes it difficult to browse when you have to constantly have to refresh it.

Pretty nice UI but sometimes buggy. Will lose where you are if you leave the app sometimes. I have a bug that won't let me sign in on a new account so I will no longer be able to use this app I guess.

This is hands-down the best app for Reddit, I literally cannot use any other app for Reddit now. It has a lot of features and customizability that makes it Head and Shoulders above the competition, even Reddit official app could take a few cues from the developers at reddit is fun. Keep up the great work guys, love the app, never change!

Overall very good. A bit clunky when trying to search for and add new subreddits. It's quick to load, has a never ending scroll and it plays nice with other apps running on my phone at the time. (Unlike the official Reddit app and Skype). It's not a resource hog (HD space, RAM) which I like, but it doesn't refresh content as often as I would like it to. I end up seeing the same posts in the evening that I did in the morning. For me, that's it's biggest flaw.

title: Fun Ways to Think - Guess Words from Pics
description:
Are you ready to play the most ENTERTAINING and CRAZIEST and the most dumb riddle game ever?

Fun ways to think will make you think in ways you have never ever thought! Get ready to have your mind-blown and answer some of the most amazing picture stump riddles ever. 

Get it NOW! Its FREE to play! 

There are so many fun, challenging and dumb riddles. They are funny, adventurous, quirky, mouth-watering, jaw-dropping and amazingly fun to solve. You will shocked at the dumb ways that this game will make you think in!

Game features:
- Free to play and a lot of fun
- Brain-twisting puzzles
- Smart, hard, kids, word, picture,impossible etc. We have all sorts of stump riddles!
- No this game is not for babies
- Many picture combos to solve, that will leave you guessing. Strain your brain, guess the answer or there is no way out! Just kidding, we always have a clue for you. So you can guess the word using our clues. There are also other features that can help you solve the riddles like hints and letter elimination. 

Sharpen your mind by playing this for hours and hours. Patrol your brain while doing so though! 101 riddles book is not going to help you. This is all ORIGINAL! If you love free riddle quiz games, this is definitely for you.

Play and live the riddles! Try and unriddle these mind-boggling pictures. There is only a dumb way to play this! 

But make sure you don't die thinking!

We have upto 8000 riddles in the pipeline! 

Credit for the brain-twisting riddles - Pujan Chheda

https://www.facebook.com/allinadaysplay

Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/ADPGames

title: Racing Xtreme 2: Top Monster Truck & Offroad Fun
description:
NEW FREE MONSTER TRUCK RACING GAME IS FINALLY AVAILABLE ON GOOGLE PLAY!

Dominate your rivals in extreme head-to-head fire-breathing MONSTER TRUCK races! Yeah, the totally new monster truck racing simulator game is finally here! Jump behind the wheel of extremely powerful MONSTER TRUCKS, let the fire blaze merrily, race the fastest 4x4 offroad monster vehicles and feast your eyes with the fast jump filled racing on the beautiful, hills & valleys packed American countryside!

 FEATURES: 
- Choose from the 30 extremely high-performance MONSTER TRUCKS!
- Enjoy extreme 3D visuals and have fun!
- Jump, jump, and jump! Perform the biggest and spectacular monster truck jump and stunts through hills!
- Prove your skills in hardcore challenges!
- Upgrade your vehicles with new tires, nitrous, exhaust, engine, gears, booster and body!
- Take part in the clash of energy monster truck drivers!
- Drive 4x4 cars and smash your rivals in head to head racing!
- Test your truck driving skills on muddy racing track!
- Conquer the top of the online leaderboards and dominate the world of monster trucks!
- The race for the glory, get the best racing results and become elite racer!
- Discover plenty of truck tunning options!

ENDLESS FUN & VARIOUS RACE MODES
Have you ever wanted to drive a monster truck in real life? Great! It's about time to test your driving skills and decide on the truck category you would choose! Choose your favorite truck and test it in the Boss Battle Races, Ranking Races, Limited Races, Extreme Races, Single Contest and Daily Race mode! Climb to the top of the online leaderboards and smash other monster truck drivers!

WORLD OF MONSTER TRUCKS
Who has the best ride? You do! Race as fast as you can to become the top new monster truck driver in the world! US countryside is a heart of the extreme clash of fire-breathing, ultimately powerful Monster Trucks! Enjoy perfectly designed world with scenic valleys, hills, lakes, and railroads. Admire the amazing view, and keep your eyes on the road, rivals and the closest ramp! Speed up, compete in drag racing, dash, conquer the hill and uphill - the race is starting right now!

RACE, SPEED UP AND JUMP
If you are a fan of Monster truck games, Truck games or RC rally games, this game will be on your favorite games list. Once you want to get the best monster truck performance and speed but on the other hand, you always care about the best, possible truck design? Well, forget about casual arcade car racing! Perhaps you know a monster truck is a pickup truck modified with a larger suspension and larger tires, usually for recreational uses. Find a perfect solution with many options to customize and upgrade your fire-breathing vehicle and polish your gear.

DOMINATE AND CRUSH YOUR RIVALS
Racing Xtreme 2 gives you reasons you gotta go to a Monster Truck Show!  Being nice in this fast racing simulation has never been an option! Jump behind the wheel, speed up to reach the maximum, climb through the leaderboards and show your rivals, what are you made of! Mark your name in offroad monster truck competition by speed and strength. Get it now - jump in the middle of the offroad action! Get famous on the drag racing or die to try! 

It's about time to get on your monster truck, customize, upgrade your gear, show how fast you are in the drag racing and your driving skills on the finish line! Your willing to fight will surely be tested, so get ready for the most intense racing game! Join the club of extreme racing drivers right now and climb to the top!

Download and play for extreme speed, amazing stunts, and adrenaline!

Other games: http://t-bull.com/#games
Facebook: https://facebook.com/tbullgames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/tbullgames

comments: It's a perfect game for people who like monster truck games the graphics is good you can upgrade your truck and the best part about it is you can do races and some of the races is challenging so this should be a excellent game who like monster trucks so that's why I rated 5 stars and plus I played this game before but I deleted the game but i found it again and redowloded hope you enjoy the game check it out !!!üòé

The game is fun initially. But after about four days, you come to realize all the levels are exactly the same. Not even a change of ramps or background. And the further you get in the game, the longer each upgrade takes to earn. If you want a game for just a day or two, this will work. But if you're looking for a good game that will have play value over time, this is not it.

Nice game, no pay to win necessary....So come on, why when you go up a tier do you say "congratulations, here's a ¬£24.99 offer to help you on your way" piss taking money grabbers, the lot of you. I originally gave 5 stars because i enjoyed it, but, the money grabbing side of it has changed my mind, Deleted the game, don't recommend you let your kids download it, the adverts get rather agressive.

As others have mentioned, the game becomes rigged after the first few challenges to encourage you to spend money. Very, very frustrating. The game also isnt very innovative or fun. There's nothing about the game that justifies its high rating, which makes me wonder if there's been some voting manipulation. Overall, a pretty bad game.

Horrible racing. Buttons missing needed for racing. Poor game play, clearly did a perfect jump but credited for too late. Way too buggy stay away. They really paid a lot of people to give a 5 star rating. I cant immagine that many ppl being so bored to find this fun. 1 track 1 button (when it shows up) and nitro.

title: Daddy's Little Helper - Messy Home Fun Adventure
description:
Usually your parents take care of you‚Ä¶ but now you get to take care of your daddy! Silly Daddy can't get anything right! Help Daddy clean up & organize the messy house! House cleaning can really be fun, we promise! Be the best little helper around with tons of fun-filled & engaging home activities! Wash dirty dishes, prepare dinner, iron the laundry, tidy up the living room and more! It‚Äôs time to take care of Daddy!

Uh oh, this house is a mess! Time for some serious house cleaning! Can you take care of Daddy & help organize the house before Mommy comes home? Do the laundry, take care of the puppy, clean the messy toilet & more! Don‚Äôt forget to leave Mommy a loving note on the fridge! Helping around the house is pretty crazy (especially when Mommy's not home!), but house cleaning with Daddy is also so fun!

Features: 
> House cleaning time! Wash the dirty dishes in soapy water & put them away on the dishrack. 
> Bake & decorate yummy cookies in the kitchen! 
> Clean out the messy fridge & put the groceries away with Daddy! 
> Take care of your messy pet - feed him & make sure he doesn‚Äôt have lice!
> Decorate the fridge with magnets - leave a note for Mommy!
> Help Daddy iron the wrinkly clothes, fold them & put them away!  
> Decorate your robot & send it off to clean the messy living room! 
> Set the table with beautiful dishes for dinner! Show everyone how much you care!

title: Panda Lu Fun Park - Amusement Rides & Pet Friends
description:
Play the cutest kids game with little panda where baby panda Lu goes to an amusement park with adorable animal friends! Ride a carousel and fun carnival rides, visit a spooky haunted house, eat sweet treats and take photos with the cutest owl, penguin, bear and turtle! Amusement park is even more fun when you are with your friends!

Enjoy the magic of the colorful unicorn themed Carousel and take an exciting ride on the Ferris Wheel for kids. It is so high you can reach the stars! Ride the amusement park‚Äôs famous Roller Coaster and see what the highest speed you can handle is! The faster, the more fun, right little panda Lu?

Visit a mysterious witch‚Äôs house full of spiders, ghosts and pumpkin lanterns! Find little panda Lu‚Äôs animal friends: they are hiding in unexpected places to scare baby Lu. Play Space Defender kids game at the amusement park‚Äôs Arcade: fight with aliens and protect your spaceship! Spin the Lucky Wheel to win toys, tasty treats and other surprises for kids!

Take a break: enjoy yummy candy apples with little panda Lu and pet friends! Choose glitter frostings and decorate them with colorful sprinkles. Time to take some cool pictures at the amusement park‚Äôs Photo Booth! Dress up little panda Lu in adorable outfits for kids, add fun accessories and choose a background!

Enjoy the most fun amusement park kids game with baby panda Lu:
¬∑ Have fun at the Carousel!
¬∑ Ride the super fast Roller Coaster!

descriptionHTML:
Play the cutest kids game with little panda where baby panda Lu goes to an amusement park with adorable animal friends! Ride a carousel and fun carnival rides, visit a spooky haunted house, eat sweet treats and take photos with the cutest owl, penguin, bear and turtle! Amusement park is even more fun when you are with your friends!

Enjoy the magic of the colorful unicorn themed Carousel and take an exciting ride on the Ferris Wheel for kids. It is so high you can reach the stars! Ride the amusement park‚Äôs famous Roller Coaster and see what the highest speed you can handle is! The faster, the more fun, right little panda Lu?

Visit a mysterious witch‚Äôs house full of spiders, ghosts and pumpkin lanterns! Find little panda Lu‚Äôs animal friends: they are hiding in unexpected places to scare baby Lu. Play Space Defender kids game at the amusement park‚Äôs Arcade: fight with aliens and protect your spaceship! Spin the Lucky Wheel to win toys, tasty treats and other surprises for kids!

Take a break: enjoy yummy candy apples with little panda Lu and pet friends! Choose glitter frostings and decorate them with colorful sprinkles. Time to take some cool pictures at the amusement park‚Äôs Photo Booth! Dress up little panda Lu in adorable outfits for kids, add fun accessories and choose a background!

Enjoy the most fun amusement park kids game with baby panda Lu:
¬∑ Have fun at the Carousel!
¬∑ Ride the super fast Roller Coaster!
¬∑ Enjoy the view from the Ferris Wheel!
¬∑ Visit the spooky Haunted House!
¬∑ Spin the Lucky Wheel to win exciting prizes!
¬∑ Decorate yummy candy apples for kids!
¬∑ Visit the Photo Booth: dress up little panda Lu in cute outfits and choose a background!
¬∑ Watch funny videos for kids to collect bonus coins!
¬∑ Explore the fun amusement park with baby panda Lu every day, get rewards and unlock exciting items!


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

About TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games foster kids‚Äô creativity and help them learn while playing the games they love. Fun and educational TutoTOONS games strive to bring meaningful and safe mobile experience to millions of children worldwide.

Important Message to Parents
This app is free to download and play. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Discover More Fun with TutoTOONS!

title: FreeCell Solitaire Fun
description:
FreeCell Solitaire Fun is an INTERESTING & CLASSIC card game with "Star Chest" and "Backpack" for you. It is designed based on the classic FreeCell solitaire gameplay. And you will enjoy the exciting solitaire moments with abundant coins, backgrounds, card faces/backs and animations in it.


HIGHLIGHTS:

- 10 Thousands of Winning Deals
Based on the original classic FreeCell gameplay, FreeCell Solitaire Fun provides you more than ten thousands different winning deal challenges in your hands!

- Creative FreeCell Card Game
Besides the classic gameplay, you can find creative tools like "Star Chest" and "Backpack" for helping you to enjoy this FreeCell Solitaire game.

- Dedicated Game Design for You
All the cards, backgrounds and animations are perfectly designed, you can get them by collecting enough stars in the "Star Chest".

- Various Cards to Customize
There are dozens of card face/back styles for you to choose, such as wood, golden, classic, diamond, candy, animal, flower, etc.

- Daily Challenges for You
If you want to play more card games, there are extra challenges for you to pass and great bonus awards every day.


FEATURES:
- Customizable beautiful themes
- Single tap or drag&drop to move cards
- Patience Solitaire with left-handed mode
- Auto-collect cards on completion
- Feature to "Undo" moves
- Feature to use "Hints"
- Feature to use "Magic Wands"
- Multiple languages supported
- Play offline at any time


CONTACT
support@solitairegame.freshdesk.com


If you'd like to play classic solitaire(known as Klondike Solitaire or Patience Solitaire) or any other solitaire or card games, you will definitely love this FreeCell Solitaire Fun game.

Want to start an amazing FREE solitaire challenges? Don't hesitate to download and enjoy this classic FreeCell card game NOW!

title: Fun Spanish: Language Learning Games for Kids
description:
Spanish Learning Games for Kids. Educational activities teach kids to read, speak & spell in Spanish.

‚Ä¢ 2 Free Lessons - 13 Learning Games!
‚Ä¢ Designed by language learning experts for kids aged 3-10
‚Ä¢ Course for preschool, early learners & young children studying languages.
‚Ä¢ More than 11,000,000 parents and kids choose our apps worldwide


FUN SPANISH EXPLAINED

It combines a structured language course with engaging and entertaining games.

Our language course is divided into lessons. Each language lesson teaches core vocabulary and presents words in several contexts to assist learning and retention.

Fun Spanish uses male and female voices. The voices use different tones and expressions so that learners can pick up on the subtleties of pronunciation.

Each game is unique, meaning your child will enjoy playing, and learn more of the Spanish language.


FEATURES

‚Ä¢ 6 or more unique games in each fun-packed lesson.
‚Ä¢ Original music, songs, sound effects and beautiful cartoon artwork
‚Ä¢ Engaging learning games will keep your child entertained as they learn


LANGUAGE LESSONS

2 Free Lessons - 14 Learning Games!

‚Ä¢ Colors - Say and spell the major colors.
‚Ä¢ Animals - Meet many animals alone and in groups.

There are many more lessons available for purchase.

‚Ä¢ Numbers - Learn how to count.
‚Ä¢ The Body - Learn the major parts of the body.
‚Ä¢ Fruits - Talk about the fruits you like.
‚Ä¢ Food - Learn how to say the food you want.
‚Ä¢ Clothes - Describe the clothing people are wearing.
‚Ä¢ Vehicles - Describe things, like cars and bicycles.
‚Ä¢ The House - Learn furniture, rooms and where they are.
‚Ä¢ Sea Animals - Compare things, like sharks and turtles.
‚Ä¢ School Bag - Learn classroom objects and whose they are.
‚Ä¢ Actions - Learn how to use action verbs


FOR EARLY LEARNERS

The variety of games, challenges, and different modes of interactivity can help with other areas of your child‚Äôs development:

‚Ä¢ Play is an important element of your child‚Äôs development
‚Ä¢ Helps your child build motor skills and concentration
‚Ä¢ Hand-eye coordination is reinforced during engaging activities
‚Ä¢ Instant feedback helps children understand how well tasks are being performed
‚Ä¢ Helps your child to use technology in a beneficial and effective way


ABOUT US

Fun Spanish is created by our team of expert educators who have brought their classroom-tested language courses to tablets and smartphones.

We have created step-by-step courses that teach languages in an effective and entertaining way.


FEEDBACK & SUPPORT

Write a review to tell us what you think or contact us via our website, Facebook, Google+ or Twitter.

‚Ä¢ More Information: http://studycat.net/apps/fun-spanish
‚Ä¢ Get Help and Support: http://studycat.net/apps/support
‚Ä¢ Like Us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/studycat.net
‚Ä¢ Google+: https://plus.google.com/+StudycatNet
‚Ä¢ Follow Us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/study_cat

title: Fun Photo Camera
description:
Make your halloween pictures unforgettable!
With Fun Photo Camera, you can create amazing photo montages with your favorite photos. Any picture will be perfect for such a great moment!
Create beautiful and funny pictures with multiple templates: animals, costumes, handsome and atractive guys, tuxedos, etc
Take a photo while you see the frame, so the picture comes out perfect.
Send the photo to your friends and family from within the application through email, Facebook, Flickr, Whatsapp, Line, Twitter, Picasa, Skype, Instagram, etc.
You can also set the picture as wallpaper on your phone.

With "Fun Photo Camera‚Äú, you can:
‚òÖ Select a photo from the gallery or take photos using the phone's camera.

‚òÖ Scale, zoom and move your gallery picture for a perfect fit within the template.

‚òÖ Add stickers and custom text.
‚òÖ Apply amazing image effects to your pictures: boost, brightness, color, contrast, emboss, engrave, flea, gaussian, gamma, grayscale, sharpen, sepia, hue, invert, saturation and many others.
‚òÖ Navigate through your image gallery.
‚òÖ HD quality templates with vivid colors.
‚òÖ Share your creations via WhatsApp, Flickr, Facebook, Picasa, Twitter, Instagram, Skype and other social networks.

title: Fun For Kids - App for kids 1-3 years old!
description:
- A game for kids 1-3 years old!

Fun For Kids is a free app for kids 1, 2 or 3 years old! In Fun For Kids you will get to meet a number of exciting animals, vehicles and music instruments, such as horse, dog, car and guitar. The game is divided into three modes: Point and Learn, Learn with Puzzles and Guess the Image. 

Point and Learn is an interactive picture book where the child can click on an animal, a car or another item and it gets animated and its special sound is played, for example a dog barking. An English voice will say the name of the item displayed. All images and sounds are selected to suit small children and toddlers and are tailored to both boys and girls.

In Learn with Puzzles there are 17 different jigsaw puzzles to choose from. When the child places a puzzle piece in its correct position the special sound of that piece is played (e.g. a car sound). When a puzzle is completed a funny cheering noise is played. All puzzles have been tested on small children 1 year, 2 years, and 3 years old during development. 

In Guess the Image, 3 different images are shown and a voice will ask the child to locate a certain item, for example "Where is the car?" If the child taps the correct item, it gets animated and its special sound is played. The images contain many different items to learn, such as cars, trains, buses, animals, music instruments and much more. Equally fun for boys and girls. 

Games for kids are a great way to learn about animals, cars, buses and other items while also having a lot of fun. All our games and apps for kids are developed to suit both boys and girls. 

The interface is designed to suit small children 1 year, 2 years and 3 years old - all in English. 

LOTS OF PUZZLES, PICTURES AND SOUND
Fun For Kids contains 17 different jigsaw puzzles and lots of beautiful and fun images of cars, animals, buses, trains, music instruments and much more. All voices are in English.

CAREFULLY TESTED
Fun For Kids has been tested on toddlers 1, 2 and 3 years old.

LEARN ANOTHER LANGUAGE
There are nine languages to choose from in the app: English, French, Russian, Italian, German, Swedish, Dutch, Danish and Norwegian.

KEY FEATURES
- Three apps in one: Jigsaw puzzles, Point & Learn and Guess the Image.
- Free app for kids
- Objects chosen for kids 1 year, 2 years and 3 years old.
- The app is fully in English
- Animals, cars, buses, instruments and much more.
- App tailored to both boys and girls.

Fun For Kids is developed by Tappy Happy. We create fun apps and games for kids 1, 2 and 3 years old. All kids games are free and suited for both boys and girls.

title: Pony Hair Salon-Take care of baby fun kids games
description:
WELCOME TO THE PONY HAIR SALON!

From the creators of Pony Hair Salon comes the puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

‚ô° Make up ‚ô°

Is your dream to become a makeup artist? Choose your favorite make up.Come and give your pony an incomparable beauty.

Use our wardrobe to assemble a dress that makes George envy, highlighting smooth skin. Put on a dress, plus some shiny shoes, don't forget the jewelry.

Accent her features with a nice makeup application. Finally, you can put on a new look that will make you look as good as kids game.

‚ô° Hair Salon ‚ô°

In Pony Hair Salon you can design and create her very own hair styles and match her customer's hairstyle of choice perfectly!

Chose the proper style of hair. Hair highlighting brings out most attractive shades for your hair. You will pick the kind of headdress you like the most and try to make it exactly the way it looks.

There will be some tricks you will see and you will have instructions on how to do it.

‚ô° Cooking ‚ô°

Select your favorite fruit and cut it with knife and put it into mixer jug then add milk and sugar. Put jug on the mixer grinder and your juice is ready to drink. Now select your glass and pour the juice from jug to glass.

Be a part of her cooking journey and help make her dreams come true! This is not just any ordinary cooking game but fun-filled emotional journey.

Dennie, Susie, Rebecca, Richard, Pedro, Suy, Candy will want to drink your delicious juice, but they don't have a chance.

‚ô° Painting ‚ô°

User simply draw's the painting and have fun with your photos. You have full control of color, brush size and opacity. Draw beautiful pictures.

Try to color the new category of images with human beings! Enjoy a variety of detailed and fascinating images.

Painting will let you improve your painting imagination, including well-chosen black and white coloring pages. Painting will let you have a fun and improve your painting skills and learn to concentrate.

*Features*

-Very easy and cute game!

-Easy gameplay and nice background sounds

-Fascinating makeup game for girls

-Some clothes and items provide great animation.

-Learn how a hair salon works.

-Color by numbers anywhere ‚Äì no pencil, paper needed.

-Take picture of cute pony and show off your pony to your friends.

Play the best games for girls in your dream summer camp with Sweet Baby Girl and friends! Mix and match girly clothes and dress up for the summer holidays. Get creative with fun summer hairstyles: wash, brush, cut and style hair. Clean up and decorate girls' camper and go kayaking with your best friends in the river. title: FLY is FUN Aviation Navigation
description:
FLY is FUN is designed by pilots for pilots.  FLY is FUN simplify flight preparation and improve situation awareness during flight, providing information on airspaces, reporting points, position on moving map, elevation, frequencies, railway, weather info ‚Ä¶ facilitate access to airfields related PDF document. Application also displays NOTAMs and data from rainfall radars.

FLY is FUN simulates ILS approach, VOR, NDB, DME, Marker beacons, RNAV navigation and Marker beacons warnings, without ILS/VOR/NDB/RNAV equipment on board.

You can test FLY is FUN for free during few days. At the end of the trial period, pilot is invited to subscribe and pay an annual fees. Doing it, he get the right of using the application "as it is" and contribute to development effort.

FLY is FUN allows:
-	Creating and modifying routes using "drag and drop", "rubber band"
-	Getting warnings, alarms and radio info before entering controlled or special use airspaces, approaching points
-	Performing route planning, evaluating distance, time and fuel consumption (depending on wind and aircraft characteristics)
-	Displaying route, bearing, trace on moving map
-	Visualizing airspace
-	Getting dynamic terrain map (colors depending of elevation above ground level)
-	STRATUX support
-	Creating and exporting Flight Plan
-	Creating and exporting Flight log 
-	Creating, importing or exporting routes, waypoints, RWY, airspace (Garmin .gpx, .kml, txt, OpenAir)
-	Recording the flight and playing it back with Google Earth
-	Sunset / Sunrise
-	Getting weather forecast along the route
-	Rainfall radar
-	Wind displaying       
-	Calculating distance between 2 points on the map
-	VACs
-	Notepad
‚Ä¶

All main screens (5 portrait and 5 landscape could easily be customized. Pilot can choose from around 100 values to display. Example:
- Altitude GPS or barometric
- Ground speed
- Bearing
- Vertical speed
- DME to next point / destination
- Estimated time to next point / destination
- Time since departure
- Stop watch
‚Ä¶

Information could be customized too depending of users preferences (VFR, IFR, IFR and VFR) and zoom level. The more you zoom IN, the more detail, information, waypoints,.. you see

Logbook
The integrated logbook, allows recording:
- Duration since departure time
- Departure and arrival time
- Departure and arrival airport
- Flight track (it is possible to export it as .kml or .gpx and to replay it)
- Used aircraft
- Pilot(s) and copilots in charge
- Distance, average speed, maximum speed
‚Ä¶


Navigation data available from open source database are updated according AIRAC cycles.

Charts and elevation dta
Free charts and elevation data are available for most of countries and could be imported directly via the application store. 
Other charts could be created and imported by the pilot itself or made on request available as commercial service.

Pilots could select the most appropriate charts: free open source charts as well as commercial charts as ICAO, Cartabossy, SkyVector, FAA sectional and terminal charts‚Ä¶

VACs and PDF files
VAC and AIP infos are available for more than 50 countries
User can easily attach your own PDF files.

Usage of external GPS connected via Bluetooth is possible

User guide: http://www.funair.cz/downloads/manuals/flyisfun.pdf

If you have any suggestion to improve this application or you find some bug please visit www.flyisfun.com

Use this application for VFR FLYING ONLY!!! We are not responsible for any use of this application.

recentChanges:
Version 26.71
- New METAR/TAF color scheme called FIF. This color scheme respects aviation VFR and IFR flight rules. Open METAR list, tap Menu / Color scheme and select FIF.
- Small improvements

Version 26.70
- Improved default / factory settings.
- improved Load default at map screen customizing (long press the compass rose, scroll down and press "Load default" button).
- Route list row displays now route name and also list of WPT names.
comments: I hate it when apps bypass the play store to inform you about updates. I was trying to evaluate this app by activating a trial. After waiting forever for it to import the database it said there is an update. I installed the update, now the app just keeps closing on opening. Please do best practices and let the play store do its job. Clearly the latest update is broken. This sucks cause I'm currently planning a big trip, flying thousands miles and evaluating apps like this.
App is gr8, but need improvement especially maps required improvement

Paid for a licence and it is now asking me for a subscription payment. - explanation was acceptable, however, in normal circumstances, a license would not be revoked in this manner. I suggest adding additional features and selling new licenses. Customers who bought licenses bootstrapped your business providing the capital to grow. More importantly, however, is the loss of trust from customers which is precious currency.

A total disrespect for all who already had bought the lifetime licence. Opposed to what i did in the past by recommending this app, now i only have the option to disrecommend this APP. What a lack of character... Pretty sad...
Not happy with the subscription

Ads, ads, and more ads. Beat a level? Here's a 20 second ad! Couldn't beat the level? Here's a 20 second ad! Claim a gift? Here's an ad! The game is ok. It's certainly not worth a minute with of ads for every minute or less of gameplay. I just played a level. It took me 15 seconds to beat. I had a 30 second ad afterwards. I'm uninstalling and never looking back.

I admit that this game is an awesome, mind blowing, spectaculous and fabulous. I really got addicted and I have not played such a beautiful game so far in my life. Usually I will delete my downloaded games within 1 to 3 days because it's boring. But this game, it's not at all boring and this game is still with me since last 2 or 3 weeks! You deserve such positive comments like this for your work. Great job. I appreciate it.

1 star because the WORST Playgendary when it comes to ads. This game takes every single opportunity to run 30-second ads - even if you opted NOT to accept multiplier earnings. You aren't given any option not to view ads. You can't pay for all stat upgrades and skip the free ones with ads. I am not going to pay to remove ads because the last 2 Playgendary games I did, the developers couldn't keep their promises of removing all ads that I still got to watch to proceed. In short I don't think you can get rid of ads in any of their games. I'll just leave it on for as long as my kids will play with it but must admit it is getting boring with the over supply of ads.

I've given this game low scores because it tries to trick you into signing up for a ¬£6.99 per week 'Platinum' membership. The way it does this is by placing a big START button at the beginning that looks like it starts the game. If you press it, you'll be charged 7 pounds a month. Absolutely disgraceful.
